khu ljo smyon pa kun tu rgyu'i/ /spyod pa dam pa'i yul du min/ /snang ba'i lung la gang 'byung spyod/ /ji ltar spyod byung spyod pa byung / /'jam dal thos 'phrigs dogs bzhin spyad/ /dam pa'i spyod pa'i snang yul nas/ /bag med che ba'i thabs mi bya/ /

bsgrubs nas mdzes pa'i tshul bzung ste/ /bag dang ldan pas gnas par bya/ /lus kyi dor ba gang dag kun/ /mthong tshor yul nas yong mi bya/ /snang ba lus kyi bya byed rnams/ /blo gros ldan pas bya ba min/ /'dus nas 'du gang byed spyod

rnams/ /dam pa'i 'dun sar rigs ma yin/ /'phyo g.yeng brkam dang ma zhi ba'i/ /spyod tshul yul nas mi bya'o/ /khams las byung ba'i lus spyod rnams/ /bsgribs sam phag gam bskyor bkab nas/ /thams cad bde bskyud 'jam byas te/ /

dam pa de la ci mdzes bya/ /dam pa gdan bskyod gang phyogs nas/ /bdag nas bsgrims te sri zhu bya/ /bskyod bcag brdzi sang gdan thabs sbyar/ /ma ldan nyid las ci bder sbyar/ /sngon rtsol lung 'byung sri zhu bsdu/ /de rdzogs nas kyang de bzhin no/ /

blo ldan spyod lam bzhi spyod na/ /sri zhu gus pas de bzhin sbyar/ /gang ma gus dang btang snyoms dag /nam yang bya ba yod ma yin/ /sri zhu bsti gnas rim gro rnams/ /bya ba'i mdun dang de zan du/ /sri zhu bcug ste ci bder 'gro/ /bde shes la sogs sri

zhus zhus/ /yang dka' thub mdun nyid du/ /gar spyod gar skabs sri zhu dbul/ /mtshan nas nam yang mi brjod cing / /dam pa bla ma bshes gnyen zhes/ /brjod pa'i tha mar zhus sgra gzhug /khyad par cir yang dbye bar bya/ /lung byung bka' bzhin

zhus zhes brjod/ /thal sbyar gsung ba gzung bar bya/ /dam pa'i lung yul byung rjes 'brang / /de kun sri zhus mtshon pa yin/ /mdzes pa'i tshul bzung gus 'dun nas/ /spobs pa nod pa gsum du zhu/ /gyong khengs med pa'i gnyen lcug

gis/ /zhabs 'bring dgos pa thams cad bya/ /dge slong sar pa'i spyod pa yis/ /bsgegs pa la sogs bya byed dang / /rgyan dang mtshon thogs spang bar bya/ /blo gros gus pa de nyid kyang / /nyid kyis nyid la dpyas bcug ste/ /gzhan gyis dpya ba'i gzhi rnams spang / /

kun du 'thun par bzang brjod pa'i/ /skyes bu gang yin de ltar bya/ /kun gyis 'thun par ma sngags pa'i/ /tha shal gang yin de spyod spang / /dkyil 'khor la sogs sbyin sreg dang / /slob ma gzung dang chos smra ba/ /lung ma byung bar mi brtsam ste/ /

dam pa'i yul nas de mi rigs/ /gal te gzhan gyi don byas na/ /de yi yo byad mi spyad de/ /de kun dam pa de la dbul/ /dam pas ci blangs lhag ma blang / /dam pa'i slob ma slob mar yang / /dam pa'i mdun du mi rigs so/ /bkur sti sri zhu la

sogs min/ /gang yin dam pa de nyid mnga'/ /snying rjes dam pas ci gnang ba/ /sri zhu mdun bsu lag gnyis kyis/ /blo dang ldan pas blang bar bya/ /rmugs med dran gsal rab bsgribs nas/ /rang gi spyod lam 'da' mi bya/ /

blo gros ldan pa'i nyi ma des/ /dam pa lha ltar mchod bya'i phyir/ /mnyes par bya ba'i yo byad brgyad/ /dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul/ /skyo dub med pa'i dad pa dang / /gyong khengs med pa'i mnyen lcug dang / /ser sna med pa'i

zang zing dang / /som nyi med pa'i sri zhu dang / /g.yo sgyu med pa'i drang rkan dang / /kha gsag med pa'i rang rgyud dang / /rmongs pa med pa'i shes rab dang / /dri ma med pa'i lhag sems brgyad/ /dam pa de la rdzogs par dbul/ /dam pas bsgo ba

bslab pa'i mtha'/ /chub par rdzogs pas rgyud dgrol te/ /shes bya kun la thogs med 'gro/ rang rgyud mdud pa dgrol ba yi/ /shes rab mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu/ /mthar chib rgyud dgrol yul spangs te/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /

bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid 'thad pa'i/ /nor mchog dam pa de la dbul/ /rang gi lus kyang ci rigs par/ /rin thang gang yin nor gyis blu/ /de nas ji bzhin gar bde bar/ /rnal 'byor yang dag 'jog la zhugs/ /

sngon gyi dam pa dam pa rnams/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro/ /sngon gyi dam pa bde gshegs rnams/ /ded dpon dam pa mnyes byas nas/ /kun spangs dgon pa'i mthar gshegs pas/ /nyid las dam pa mnyes par 'gyur/ /

des na ded dpon dam pa dang / /nam du 'ang 'bral ba ma yin te/ /ji ltar lus dang grib ma bzhin/ /blo gros dris na dam par 'gyur/ /ji ltar cang shes gyi ling dag /sdom byed sgrog gis bcings 'gyur ba/ /bkrol byas bde blag byung

'gyur na/ /ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba ltar/ /sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di/ /mi shes bcings pas bcings 'gyur ba/ /dam pas rnam grol sgo phye bas/ /shes rgyud kun 'grol thogs med 'gro/ /'di ni mi shes rgyud 'gro ba'i/ /mdud pa'i

bcing ba 'grol ba ste/ /rgyud rnams grol ba'i bslab pa ru/ /goms par bya ba rab tu bcos/ /lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni rgyud yongs su dgrol ba'i bslab pa'i mtha' yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pas dman pa'i

lus kyi sems dpa' rnams dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams slob dpon dam par bskrun par shes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las bsnyen bkur dam pa mchog gi le'u ste drug bcu bdun pa'o// //

de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa'i lus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ /kye grogs po dag sgo dbye bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ ji bzhin pa yi de kho na/ /nyid du nges pa'i ngo bo la/ /rig dang ma rig rnam pa yis/ /kun shes

spyod dang kun du rmongs/ /rnam pa gnyis su snang ba la/ /tha dad du ma mang por 'gyur/ /rmongs pa rnam pa gnyis snang ba/ /mi shes pa dang log par shes/ /mi shes phyal ba rgyang pan gnyis/ /log rtog mur thug mu stegs pa/ /de yang zhen chags

log sred can/ /'jig rten 'jig rten pa zhes bya/ /mu stegs log dang gzhan rkyen log / /zhar las 'byung ba zhes kyang bshad/ /mi shes 'di gnyis gzhir snang ba/ /dman rigs dang ni rigs ma nges/ /rigs chad 'du shes can 'di

dag /kun nas bkrigs pa'i mun pa yin/ /'du shes can bzhi chags pa dang / /gang la g.yeng dang ya nga can/ /mos pa can zhes grags pa rnams/ /sa bon 'dzin pa'i zhing du snang / /log par rtog 'di ya mtshan can/ /brgya phrag gsum

dang drug bcu gnyis/ /nyi shu'am bcu ste lnga gnyis dang / /tha dad rnam pa du mar snang / /yo byad med pa'i phyogs 'dzin las/ /'jig pa'i tshogs dang mthar 'dzin dang / /log par 'dzin dang lta khyad dang / /rang gi brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin te/ /

rigs mi mthun pa sde lngar grags/ /rang bzhin log pas log pa nyid/ /gzhan rkyen log pa phra med spyod/ /lung la rten dang rtags tsam 'dzin/ /bcos mar spyod dang mu cor smra/ /lung gi phyogs tsam brten pa dang / /phyogs log gol dang

bslad pas 'chal/ /phyogs ltos gcod pa rnams bzhir grags/ /bcos ma gzhan las gyur pa dang / /'di las gyur pa gnyis kho na/ /gnas dang 'khor dang yo byad nor/ /longs spyod lnga ldan gzhan las gyur/ /dran pa rtag lta ltos

'dzin rgyu/ /med pa'i mtha' dang mtha' med shes/ /kun nas rnam par mi g.yeng lta/ /gong du shes pa yod smra lta/ /de bzhin med par lta ba dang / /'di gang 'di las gyur lta ba/ /gang du yod min med min lta/ /bdag shi 'di tshe mya ngan 'das/ /

gang 'dir phyogs tsam brten pa ni/ /gang ma yin pa ma yin nyid/ /phyogs log gol bar gang gyur pa/ /drug ste so so tha dad dang / /spyir lta gang rig skyon med pa'o/ /rgyur lta byams pas dag par lta/ /'tsho ba bcos pas dag lta dang / /

rgyan la lham dang gos bcos pa/ /skra spung bcas dang rgyan can dang / /dka' thub sten pa drug pa'o/ /slad pas 'chal ba gang 'di la/ /bsten pas bdag lta rten rtog dang / /rten chags byin chags bkra shis mtshan/ /skyabs log yongs su 'chal

ba'o/ /phyogs ltos gcod pa gang zhe na/ /phyi rol pa dang yang dag pa/ /gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa'o/ /gang 'dir phyi rol rnam pa gsum/ /bye brag pa dang tha snyad pa/ /rang snang gcig phyogs gcod pa'o/ /yang dag phra dang zab pa dang / /

rgya che yangs pa de kho na/ /gsang sngags rig byed rig spyod dang / /rigs sbyor dam par phyogs ltos gcod/ /gsang chen brtul zhugs cher spyod dang / /rgyal dpog pa dang rgyal thabs pa'o/ /zhar las byung ba gang 'di dag /mtha' yas sde bcur

rdzogs pa ste/ /gang mu zin pa de rtags 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi nye gnas so/ /lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang / /zhal nas byung ba ji lta ba/ /'jig rten sgron ma nub rjes na/ /gang dag mos pa tha dad pas/ /zhar las byung

ba'ang de bzhin no/ /kun shes spyod pa 'ang rnam pa gnyis/ /rim gyis pa dang gcig pa'o/ /rim gyis 'jug pa rnam gsum du/ /phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang / /bsgrub spyod mngon rtogs gsum nyid do/ /'di yang khyad par rnam gnyis gyis/ /

gsum gsum gnyis su dam pa yis/ /gsung ba khyod ci mi shes sam/ /des na che chung gnyis gsum drug /sgrub pa zab pa phra ba gnyis/ /blo che zab pa dman pa nyid/ /spyod pa rlabs chen cha shas can/ /rgya che ba dang mtshan

mar spyod/ /de na gsang chen gsang bar bshad/ /mngon rtogs rnam gnyis phyi nang 'jug /mi mthun phyogs kyis gal bzung nas/ /cha gnyis so sor 'dod pa 'byung / /phyi rol bye brag tha snyad gnyis/ /cha gnyis gcig las rtsod

pa 'byung / /nang 'jug sems snang dbus mtha' med/ /phyi nang snrel zhir phyogs 'dzin cing / /gang 'dir nges par gcod pa 'byung / /mtha' dbus 'byed dang nges par 'jug /gtan la 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung / /rang dang lta ba'i phyogs

'dzin cing / /brtsod pas the tshom 'byung ba dang / /dbus mtha' 'byed dang nges par 'jug /gtan la 'bebs pa de bzhin 'byung / /cig car 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bya dang bya thabs bya med pa/ /skyes dang ma skyes skye 'gag med/ /'di kun

ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs/ /ma 'dres mkha' la gza' skar bkram/ /yongs su rdzogs pa mkha' khyab bdal/ /'ja' snang mkha' ltar ma 'dres gcig /rmongs rims cig car 'jug spyod pa/ /'dod pa'i yul la zhen spong dang / /

sbyong sgyur shes rtogs spyod dbang byed/ /shes pa 'jig rten rtog 'phags pa/ /spyod pa blo ldan dbang sgyur thabs/ /gang 'di'i snod kyang bzhir gzigs te/ /zhen chags log sred rigs rgyud can/ /blo gros can gyi snod

rnams la/ /bstan bya rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa/ /'dod rkyen bkri drang brgyud pa'i tshig /ldem dgongs don dam nges pa bzhi/ /snod kyi rkyen dang sbyar ba yin/ /'di kun shes bya'i gzhi gcig pa/ /'dod pas mthong ba tha dad pa'o/ /

'di ltar mthong sgo tha dad bzhin/ /rnam par snang 'byung bkod pa la/ /gang gis kun la zhugs bltas nas/ /gcig tu 'bebs pa dam pa'o/ /ji ltar bung ba khung tshol ba/ /kun du 'jug cing byung nas ni/ /rang gi gseng khung gang yin

par/ /nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshol pa/ /spyod sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu/ /lta sgor 'jug cing brtags bsdur nas/ /don dam nges pa'i gsang nyid la'o/ /de nyid don gyi rjes gcad phyir/ /sgo mo kun

nas bsdur ba yi/ /bslab par bya ba'i thabs yin te/ /goms par bya ba rab tu gces/ /lang ka'i bdag po de dag ni phyis 'byung bar snang ba'i sgo yongs su dbye ba yin te/ /kun nas bsdur bar bslab pa'i mtha' yongs su

bgros par shes par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi sgo rang snang bar shes par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las chos thams

cad kyi sgo rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag mthar phyin par bya ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa ni bsam du med pa mthar phyin par bya'o/ /bsam du med pa ni sems kyi de kho na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o/ /sems kyi de kho na nyid ni dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho na nyid du mthar phyin par bya'o/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgongs pa dam pa 'dus pa'i de kho na nyid la mkhas na sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi de kho na nyid la mkhas na bsam du med pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /bsam du med pa la mkhas na

bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/ de ni dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa nyid du shes par bya'o/ /grogs po dag de bas na bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad kyi rnam pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum gyis yongs su 'grel ba ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang / bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang / bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /grogs po dag bya ba'i rnal

'byor yang gsum du shes par bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dang / nang gi rnal 'byor dang / phyi nang gi rnal 'byor ro/ /grogs po dag de la phyi'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / de bzhin

du chu rdo rje dang / me rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang / nam mkha' rdo rje dang / gzugs rdo rje dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/ /grogs

po dag nang gi rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / de bzhin du rtog pa dang / dpyod pa la sogs pa gang zin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing

phul du gyur pa'o/ /grogs po dag phyi nang gi rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / dman pa dang / dam pa dang / 'byung ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / byas pa dang / ma byas pa dang / bcas pa dang /

ma bcas pa dang / spyi thun dang / khyad par gyi rnam pa rnams dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/ /grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba'i rnal 'byor du shes par bya'o/ /bya ba byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

rten pa dang / spyod pa dang / mig dang / khyad par dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / rtsal gyis gnon pa dang / kun nas rig pa'o/ /grogs po dag de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/ /grogs po dag gzhan yang

'di lta ste/ sbyor ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / bskyod pa dang / bsgyur ba dang / rtsal dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jug pa dang / sgo dang / shes pa dang / gnas dang / rig pa dang / lam dang / 'jug pa dang / ye shes dang / khyab pa'i rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du

mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang mthong ba dang / ma yengs pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / sngags dang / yi ge'i sgo rnam pa de dag kyang dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid du mthar phyin cing phul du gyur pa'o/ /grogs po dag de dag ni bya ba byed pa'i

rnal 'byor du shes par bya'o/ /kye grogs po dag bya ba med pa'i rnal 'byor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang / bslab pa dang / sbyor ba dang / rtog pa dang / ltung ba dang / ma nor ba dang / nges pa dang / dgongs pa dang / ye shes dang / tshogs dang / bsgrub pa dang / dngos sgrub

dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / chen po dang / ye shes dang / byung tshul dang / che ba dang / rol pa dang / rngom pa dang / brjid pa dang / mthu dang / cho 'phrul dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam pa dag dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid mthar phyin cing phul du gyur par bya'o/ /de yang

ji lta zhe na/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ ji ltar mthon ri rtse dag la/ /sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na/ /mthon ser snang mthong kun gsal bas/ /thams cad kun snang lam la mkhas/ /de bzhin shes rab mthon ri la/ /brtson pa dam pas

kun bltas na/ /kun gyi phul du shes rab phyin/ /mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med do/ /don la mkhas par bya ba de/ /phul du byung ba'i bslab pa ste/ /dgongs pa dam pa de nyid la/ /mkhas par bya ba rab tu gces/ /grogs po dag de dag ni mthar phyin

par bya ba rab tu shes par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams kun gyi phul du gyur par dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po

las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dam pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag thams cad du 'du bar byas pa ni 'di lta ste/ bya ba dang / rang bzhin dang / bsgyur bas so/ /

grogs po dag de la bya ba ni bsdu ba'i bya bas so/ /rang bzhin ni chos nyid kyis so/ /bsgyur bas 'dul bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang / dus dang / tshad dang / grags pa dang / gags dang / rtags dang / thob pa'o/ /grogs po dag de la rgyu ni

yo byad chen po lnga kho na'o/ /dus ni mtha' bcu rdzogs pa dang / nye bar dris pa dang / rigs can 'du ba dang / gsal ba thob pa dang / las su rung ba dang / mtshan ma 'byung ba dang / mang po sngags pa dang / nyams rnyed pa dang / bya ba rdzogs pa'o/ /

grogs po dag tshad ni 'di lta ste ded dpon dang / snga ltas dang / smyin pa'o/ /grogs po dag ded dpon gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ goms pa dang / rig pa dang / 'du ba dang / thob pa dang / rdzogs pa'o/ /grogs po dag snga ltas ni 'di lta ste/ mthong ba dang /

'byor pa dang / nus pa dang thos pa'o/ /grogs po dag smin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mngon spyod dang / mi bskyod pa'o/ /grogs po dag grags pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang chu bo bzhi'i rgyud du byung ba dang / gang dag las 'phags pa dang / gang dang ldan

pa dang / gang la mkhas pa dang / gang thob pa nyid do/ /grogs po dag gags gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thob pa dang / mi chags pa dang / mi gos pa dang / sreg pa'o/ /rtags gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ grags pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / btsan pa dang / 'byung

ba'o/ /grogs po dag thob pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bskur bas thob pa dang / rtsal gyis thob pa'o/ /grogs po dag de yang 'di ltar thob par rig par bya ste/ gang 'dir snying rje'i yul rnams la/ /byin brlabs 'byung ba gang yang rung / /

'dun pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag la/ /glegs bam bcu gnyis sbyin par bya/ /gang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor la/ /nyi zla gnyis ni sbyin par bya/ /dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rin chen bdun nyid nges par 'thob/ /lung chen thob pa'i rnal

'byor pas/ /g.yung drung brgyad dag thob pa yin/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rtsal bcu'i khyad par de nyid 'thob/ /kun gyi bla ma dam pas ni/ /rtog stong 'bar ba bla med 'thob/ /dgongs pa kun 'dus gsang chen 'di/ /ma thos gzu

lums rang bshad pas/ /rab 'byams bstan pa kun la yang / /dam pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba/ /mang pos dbang por dpon stabs te/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen gyis/ /kun la dbang sgyur thob pa ltar/ /

de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bstabs te/ /tog stong 'bar ba la sogs pas/ /khyad par bla ma dam par 'gro/ /'di ni bla ma'i khyad par te/ /rgyal sar nges par 'byung ba yi/ /rtsal gyis bgrod cing bslab pa'i

thabs/ /goms par bya ba rab tu gces/ /kye grogs po dag de dag ni thams cad 'du bar bya ba yongs su bgros par shes par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa dam pa dag lung dam pa bstan pa'i drod thob par gyur to/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor dam pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag

la dor bar bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ gang go cha gyon pa'i rjes su ma ldog par 'gro ba ste/ 'di ltar ji bzhin pa'i rjes su ji snyed pa 'gro ba/ nam mkha'i rjes su 'byung ba 'gro ba bzhin sems nyid kyi rjes su sems las byung ba 'gro ba

yin/ chos nyid kyi rjes su chos thams cad 'gro ba yin/ de bzhin du dgongs pa dam pa'i rjes su gang gsung ba dang / gang mdzad pa thams cad 'gro bas na/ dgongs pa kun nas 'dus pa ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du gang du spyod pa de ltar ro/ /

kye grogs po dag de yang 'di lta ste/ mnyam dang mi mnyam mi mnyam mnyam/ /kun nas mi mnyam yongs mi mnyam/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i khyad par yang / /gang dang don gyi mnyam par spyad/ /byin gyi brlabs kyis spyod pa 'am/ /dbang sgyur thabs

kyi spyod pa ste/ /dper na nam mkha' rgyal po 'am/ /ji ltar me dpung chu bo 'dra/ /de yang de yul che chung gis/ /khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yin/ /rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis/ /dbang bsgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la/ /che chung rim pa yod pa

bzhin/ /rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang / /thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang / /bab tshod thad du 'jug pa ste/ /dper na glang chen chur 'jug pa/ /rab dang glong chen bab mi lta/ /de yang rtsal sgyid drag zhan gyis/ /la la thad du gcod

pa la/ /la la chu yi gzhol phyogs so/ /de ltar rnal 'byor spyod 'jug pa/ /'bras bu don la bab gcod kyang / /rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis/ /ji ltar nus tshad de spyod phyir/ /sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang / /sgrib dang gol sa

rtog pa dang / /spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang / /dus dang dngos grub mthar phyin dang / /lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur nas/ /thams cad gcig las med na yang / /grangs sam dbye ba grags phrag rnams/ /snod kyi rtsal dang sbyar nas ni/ /

khyad par ci yang bstan pa yin/ /de yang rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/ /dang po las kyi khyad par las/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams/ /rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor

chen po'i tshul/ /spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa/ /sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang / /btsal ba'i yul ni chad ma yin/ /nor bu las kyi 'phang dmas pa/ /rang skal 'tsho ba'i tshong bor nas/ /rgyal po thabs kyis 'phang mtho

ba'i/ /longs spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang / /de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral zhing / /skal ldan can gyi don 'di dag /skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o/ /de phyir dgongs pa kun 'dus la/ /gang 'dir rnal 'byor dman don du/ /gso

dang sbyong ba'i spyod pa dag /dman pa dag dang mnyam par gsungs/ /gso dang bslang ba'i rtog pa 'di/ /rtog pa can dang 'thun par spyad/ /gso ba rtog pas zin pa'i nad/ /lta spyod nyam pa'i sman gyis gso/ /shi bslang ba yi rtog pa 'di/ /

khams gsum 'khor ba'i nad pa rnams/ /rtag chad mthar shi ro gling nas/ /gti mug bam chen ro blangs te/ /skye 'gag med par blang ba'i phyir/ /ro la yid bzhin nor bu yi/ /sngags kyis btab ste gnon par bya/ /ri yi gnyen por

bdag gyur nas/ /ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas/ /ro yi gzi byin byung ba na/ /bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus bya/ /ro de 'gul bar gyur pa dang / /gang gi 'gyur rtsis byug par bya/ /ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas/ /bzlas

pa drag po rgyun mi gcad/ /gang der nges par gyur pa dang / /cho 'phrul 'jigs tshul ston par byed/ /brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis/ /de tshe ro yi lce bcad nas/ /ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur/ /de bzhin ji ltar 'dod

pa yi/ /rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur/ /lce bshad ral gri mtshon cha dang / /ro yi mgo bo gcad pa des/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste/ /mgo thod go char bzung nas ni/ /lce yi ral gri mtshan thogs nas/ /lha min

g.yul yang bzlog par 'gyur/ /ro langs grub pa'i rkang 'gyogs ni/ /dpag pa'i tshad las 'das pa ste/ /skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa yis/ /phyogs bzhir bltas te dus gcig tu/ /mda' 'phangs sa la ma babs par/ /

mtha' blangs skad cig 'jig rten bskor/ /skyes bu lag tshod ma yal bar/ /de ma thag tu gnas su slebs/ /yud ltar shin du myur ba 'thob/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /ro la 'dod pa thams cad 'byung / /ro la ror

bsgrubs ro grub na/ /ro yi dngos po mi snang bar/ /gang ltar bsgrubs pa de snang phyir/ /ro la rnam rtog ga la yod/ /ro la ro yi rang bzhin dag /med par shes pas thag chod bzhin/ /spyod pas de ltar mnyam spyad na/ /lta spyod

mnyam zhes dam pas bshad/ /'di ni shi ba slong ba yi/ /bdud rtsi dam pa'i spyod pa'o zhes/ /dgongs pa dam pa'i kun 'dus gsungs/ /grogs po dag de dag ni shi ba slong ba'i rtog pa yongs su spyod par shes par bya'o/ /grogs po dag

de la sbyong ba'i spyod pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rtog pa'i zug rngu sbyang ba dang / rgyud yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la rtog pa'i zug rngu sbyang ba ni gang rtog pa'i dngos po sbyong ba'o/ /grogs po dag rgyud yongs su sbyang ba ni bkod pa'i bya bas sbyang ba dang / me yi

bya bas sbyang ba'o/ /de la bkod pa'i bya bas sbyang ba gang zhe na/ brtsam pa las kyi dang po dang / /dam pa'i don la 'jug pa na/ /thabs mchog lngas ni spyad par bya/ /rdo rje dus tshigs bsnyen pa dang / /gang 'dir nye bar

bsgrub pa dang / /bsgrub po chen pos sbyor ba la/ /grangs dus mtshan mar bcas par bya/ /rnal 'byor bcad pa'i bka' sgo 'dir/ /gsang go mi dbye skrag par 'gyur/ /ci phyir dang po yin pas na/ /byis pa blo shed ma bye ba/ /
ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis/ /theg chen don las gol bar 'gyur/ /gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag /'jig rten drug las drangs nas kyang / /'gyur dbang ma nges sar bzhag ste/ /ji ltar 'tsham par bde

thabs sbyar/ /rdo rje thabs chen tshom bu lnga/ /rdo rje 'dzin tshogs bcu drug ldan/ /dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ /bri bya yang na bsam pa 'am/ /brjod dam dngos sam mtshan ma la/ /'jig rten dbang po chos lugs kyis/ /

mos pa la bskyed dran byas te/ /rang bzhin yul las phan nas ni/ /phyag bya la sogs mchod na ni/ /rdo rje dman dang rtsir sbyar ba/ /yo byad chen po la sogs pas/ /rdo rje thabs kyi tshogs la dbul/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor glu

blangs te/ /mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas/ /mnyes nas rgyud sbyangs 'dod par bya/ /snod du rung ba'i slob ma dag /dbang mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis/ /'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol/ /rdo rje tha tshigs

rnam lnga yis/ /bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rigs par/ /rtsal gyi rnam par byin nas kyang / /rdo rje gal chen mna' bor ro/ /de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pa nan tan gyis/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dka' bya'o/ /mi nus

la sogs mi snang ba'i/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis nan chags bya/ /rmongs pa gang phyir sems bskyed de/ /ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur/ /shes rab mig can shes bya'i yul/ /thams cad rim bzhin bstan par bya/ /drod can blo dkyil che

rnams la/ /rnal 'byor nang par gsang sgo dbye/ /rtsing po 'gros kyi dmu rgod la/ /gcan mkhrang 'khor ba'i g.yeng rnams bstan/ /rdo rje lung gi tshig can la/ /ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur/ /rtsal med mi nus gang dag la/ /phan pa

'ba' zhig bsngags pa yin/ /gnas 'dir gsal dang mi gsal dag /'od mi dbab cing ljid mi dbab/ /rdo rje blo yi yul can la/ /rtsal chen sbyong zhes gdam par bya/ /rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du/ /rdo rje don gyi ltang chen bsher/ /

rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye/ /so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dag /spyi 'am yang na re re'o/ /gzhan yang shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs/ /ji ltar thabs kyi tshogs sbyor ltar/ /gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs

pa/ /lha mo tshogs su bkod nas kyang / /gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar skas/ /rdo rje mnyam pa'i gzungs rnams la/ /mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /bro gar glu tshig la sogs

pas/ /rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub/ /gzhan yang dus bzhi mnyam rig na/ /dus zhes bya bar ga la rigs/ /dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na/ /de nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje lha mo dus kyi tshogs/ /'das dang da ltar

byung ba dang / /mi 'byung ma nges cha rnams la/ /dbang sgyur mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams/ /'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang / /stongs par gyur pa de dag tu/ /rdo rje rnam thar tshad med dang / /sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi/ /shes rab 'khor

dang dam pa'i dkyil/ /ji ltar rim par rdo rje yi/ /glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis/ /mchod dang 'jug tshul ji ltar bar/ /cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar/ /lha yi nyi ma rnams la'o/ /bde ba chen po la sogs pa/ /tshom bu 'am yang

na phyag rgya rnams/ /spyir ram re rer sbyar bar bya'o/ /'das pa rnam thar tshogs bskrun te/ /da ltar 'byung dang mi 'byung la/ /tshad med sems dang rnam thar bskrun/ /de ni mnyam pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor byang chub sems/ /

rdzogs pa bcu drug zla rgyas tshul/ /snying rje ye shes shar ba na/ /mkha' la nyi shar tshul bzhin du/ /dam pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /yang dag nges pa'i sa pa yin/ /bcu gsum la la bgrod pa ni/ /rdo rje dus kyi

rgyun tshogs sbyar/ /skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba/ /bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa bzhin/ /bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa/ /bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas na/ /brdzes pa'i zla ba bcu drug gis/ /nyi gsal 'od

kyi phyag rgya la/ /mdzes par spras pa'i bde ba de/ /bcu drug tshogs kyi rdzogs pa bskrun/ /rdzogs pa nyid na mi dmigs pa/ /de bzhin nyid du sbyangs pas na/ /mnyam pas stong par gyur pa la/ /thams cad chos skur

rdzogs byang chub/ /sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med de/ /rmad byung sems bskyed las chen spyad/ /phra mo drod du gyur pa na/ /dam pa spyad na nyi ma 'char/ /dus 'di rgyun gyi bar chad na/ /snyan pa dag gis bzlog par dka'/ /

bar chad byung na bskang gso bya/ /mkha' la zla gsal gra rgyas bzhin/ /sa la rnal 'byor gra rgyas spyad/ /gang 'di rgyas na bsod nams dang / /bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya/ /des ni nyi zla zhon 'gro ba'i/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas phan

cad/ /bde chen bcu gsum sa la 'grub/ /gzhan yang rgyun du bya ba ni/ /chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te/ /rgyal ba sku gsung thugs su snang / /sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag /yi ge phreng ba nyid la rdzogs/ /yi ge phyag rgya'i ye shes rnams/ /

rgyun gyi rgyun du bya ba yin/ /des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin thob/ /rgyun gyi rgyun du mi gcad pa/ /rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la/ /yi ge'i tshogs ni bskyed sbyar la/ /mchod bsnyen bcas sbyar de bzhin no/ /'di ni don dam nye ba'i lam/ /

dam pa bskrun par 'gyur phyir ro/ /'dir ni rgyun gyi rgyun tshogs des/ /dam pa'i dam par de nyid 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rdo rje dra ba'i dbyings/ /thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'di/ /rdo rje rdo rje yin pas na/ /rdo rje dbang yul 'brel bas ni/ /thams

cad 'byung bas dbyings zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin rdzogs bcas/ /'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te/ /gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas/ /ji ltar rim bzhin sbyar byas na/ /ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni/ /'dod pa'i

khams ltar mnyam par gsungs/ /gzhan yang gang du gang 'brel ba'i/ /gsang chen dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/ /phan tshun dra bas 'brel ba la/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ /

sprul pa bye ba ci yang snang / /gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i yul de nyid/ /rtsal dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo pa/ /'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya'o/ /gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams ni/ /blo gros chen po thabs

ldan pas/ /mi skrag dga' ba'i ngo mtshar skye/ /gsang chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas/ /lnga gnyis zung du 'khril ba ni/ /g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril tshul sbyor/ /g.yas nyid byang chub rdo

rje dang / /rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o/ /g.yon nyid sgra brnyan dril bu dang / /rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la/ /'byo zhing 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas/ /chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /seng chen g.yo ba'i tshul gyis

ni/ /seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' dman pa'i lus khri la/ /rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te/ /kha dog lnga yi 'od 'bar ba/ /bcu gsum cha lugs bsgegs pa rnams/ /rim gyis sam ni cig car bskyed/ /

gang 'dir 'dod khams chags zhen pa'i/ /dbang po rim par sbyang bar bya/ /de min yab yum yong mi dmigs/ /gsang nyid tshogs kyi 'khor rnams kyang / /gnas 'gyur ba yi rang bzhin gyis/ /phyag rgya rgyal po rgyal mor

bcas/ /brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'byung sbyor/ /sa dang nam mkha' spyan rdo rje/ /byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal/ /nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni/ /bzhi gnyis dag gis mnyer sbyor ba/ /bsam bya la sogs de bzhin no/ /

rdo rje sgo dang bcas par ni/ /rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod cher sbyar bas/ /mnyes nas sbyar phyir rim bzhin dbul/ /gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis/ /gsang ba'i don

rnams bsgrub par bya/ /'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba 'thun/ /thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi/ /rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs/ /mdza' 'phrod rkyen dang dgyes sbyor ldan/ /lha dang rig 'dzin rnal 'byor ril/ /ma lus tshogs

pas chos 'di spyad/ /skad cig yud tsam thang cig gam/ /yud tsam nyin cig zla re 'am/ /lo yi nyi ma bkra shis kyi/ /dus la bab pa'i dus chen dag /byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus chen yin/ /ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams/ /dag dang

ma dag khyad par gyis/ /gtsang ma kha zas la sogs dang / /rnam rtog nad 'joms bdud rtsi rnams/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs dang 'byung po la/ /ji ltar 'byor ldan nan tan bya/ /bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka dang / /chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i/ /

skyon bzhi spangs te bzlog tshul sbyar/ /rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur/ /gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer gzhag ste/ /ji bzhin 'dod ltar bde bar sbyar/ /lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang / /bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang / /don grub

shi ba gso ba'i phyir/ /las 'di spyad par shin du gces/ /'di dag blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i/ /mdun du brjod par bya ba'i rigs/ /rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang / /cis 'dul de ltar rtsal dang sbyar/ /des na las 'di khyad par yang / /

tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te/ /bsnyen pa dag la goms byas nas/ /bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o/ /de skad sems dpa' rdo rje des/ /'dus pa phal mo che la bshad/ /'dus pa kun gyi don mthong ba/ /rdo rje 'dzin

pa de la gsol/ /sems dpa' chen po bdag cag gis/ /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /thabs nyid shes rab nyid bkod dang / /kun nas mnyam dang bcu drug cha/ /yi ge tshogs dang 'byung ba'i dbyings/ /gnyis med dra bar 'brel la sogs/ /

rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du/ /snang bar nges par mthong lags so/ /de skad gsol bas des gsungs pa/ /gang 'dir 'dus pa'i tshogs mang kun/ /ji ltar mthong ba de ltar yin/ /ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin nyid/ /

rang bzhin dkyil 'khor de kho na/ /dgongs pa dam pa lhun grub pa/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid/ /de dag rtsa ba sems nyid pas/ /sems can gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal/ /rang bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du/ /

thams cad ye nas zhugs bkod rdzogs/ /de las khyad par skal ldan mi/ /spyod yul gyur pa gzugs brnyan te/ /ras 'jam khod snyoms bzang la sogs/ /kha dog lnga 'am nyi shu lngas/ /ma mthong rmongs la bstan phyir mtshon/ /ma

nyams mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur/ /bstan zhing nges 'jam khang bu la/ /kha dog 'bar bar gzugs mtshon te/ /phyag rgya ma nyams mdzes ldan na/ /mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ston par nus/ /gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa/ /

gang blugs rgyal ba'i sku byas te/ /phyag rgya ma nyams dang ldan na/ /de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/ /shel rdo dung la sogs pa la/ /'bur las rgyal ba'i sku byas na/ /de bzhin ma nyams rgyas mdzad na/ /mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur/ /blags

sha byang chub shing sogs la/ /mkhas pas bzor bzhogs gzugs brnyan gyis/ /phyag rgya ma nyams kun rdzogs na/ /'di yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur/ /sa la sogs la phyag rgya byas/ /kha dog mdzes dang ldan byas la/ /mtshan ma 'byung

ba'i rten yin te/ /mtshan mas mtshan ma grol rig pa/ /gang dag sa las rgyal ba'i dbyibs/ /kun du lham par byas pa la/ /tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes bkod na/ /rnam grol rig pa'i rten du 'gyur/ /gang gi gzugs brnyan gang yin dang / /

de yi rang bzhin gcig pas na/ /'di la khyad par cung zad med/ /'di yis rnam grol rig par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs pho brang gang yang rung / /dkyil 'khor tshul du gang byed pa/ /yid 'ong mtshan ldan dben phyogs su/ /kun nas lham par

mdzes byas la/ /srad bu brgyad dang ldan byas te/ /bsdu ba'i bya bas mdzes byas pa/ /de nas srad bu gcig gis bskor/ /dkyil 'khor tshul du gyur pa dang / /nang du lham bu srad bu brgyad/ /le'u tshe ldan pa dgur 'gyur te/ /mtha' zad

sum char byas pa la/ /kun gyi nang du srad bu gsum/ /phra mo dag gis mdzes par brgyan/ /dgu yi char ni bgos pa la/ /sgo dang sgo khyud sum cha bya/ /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas la/ /rin chen ka ba'i nang logs su/ /sangs rgyas pho brang dbu

rtser bya/ /bsdu ba tshad med rnam thar sgo/ /rim pa gsum gyis mdzes pa la/ /rta babs them skas kyis kyang brgyan/ /dbus kyi pho brang le'u tshe 'am/ /'khor lo dpal be'u pad ma dang / /rin chen zur brgyad la sogs pa/ /ji ltar rigs pa de bzhin

bri/ /rgyan ni rin chen sna tshogs dang / /pany+tsa ra ka ta ra na/ /phreng ba dang ni dra bas brgyan/ /za ra tshags dang chun 'phyang dang / /dril bu g.yer ka the'u chung 'phyang / /rol mo sgra sgrogs lha yi bu/ /mang pos phyi nang nam mkha' las/ /mchod pa sna tshogs 'bul

ba bri/ /theg chen gdung bzhis rab brgyan te/ /rin chen kha bad mchod rten dang / /rgyal mtshan rin chen 'od 'bar bas/ /gzhal yas mdzes par brgyan pa ni/ /chos kyi pho brang ci 'dra bar/ /de 'dra de nyid mtshon par bri/ /gzhal yas khang du gang

rgyur pa/ /kun gyis mdzes dang legs par brgyan/ /mchod pa bla na yod med kun/ /ji ltar 'byor ltar nan tan dbul/ /rgyal srid longs spyod bcas pa dang / /glu bro gar dang rol mor bcas/ /dug 'joms sman dang bdud rtsi rnams/ /

rgyal ba rgya mtsho snyed la dbul/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mchod sbyar bas/ /rgyud byang thams cad mnyam par 'gyur/ /de skad smras pas 'dus pa kun/ /thams cad rgyud byang rnam grol rig /grogs po dag de dag ni bkod pa'i bya bas yongs su

sbyang bar shes par bya'o/ /grogs po dag 'di la me'i bya bas yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad chos nyid du sbyang ba'i phyir dngos po thams cad me'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis

chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong ste/ /shin du ngam nas ngo mtshar du bstod pa/ /e ma'o sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /che ba'i che ba byin brlabs che/ /ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che/ /cho 'phrul chen po sna

tshogs che/ /thabs mchog dpag gis mi lang ste/ /chos kun me dpung 'bar bar snang / /de nyid ye shes gsal ba'i klong / /'bar 'phro gsal bar gyur pa ni/ /mun gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs/ /bde chen dbyings su

kun rdzogs par/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa lags/ /'bar ba chen po a la la/ /gzi brjid zer 'phro a la la/ /mtha' yas kun sdud a la la/ /thams cad sreg byed a la la/ /za byed chen po a la la/ /mtha' dang dbus

med a la la/ /thugs rje bde mchog a la la/ /dbang phyug 'jigs byed a la la/ /gsang mchog rmad 'byung byin brlabs kyis/ /me yi rang bzhin chen po dag /bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol/ /de skad 'dus pa'i gsol

pa las/ /de nyid dgyes pas 'di skad du/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag /nges par bshad kyis gus par nyon/ /khyad par bla ma'i lam mchog 'dis/ /rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas/ /rgyal ba kun

mnyes kun bsregs sbyangs/ /don grub las kyi mchog tu sbyangs/ /ji bzhin pa'i hom khung du/ /ji snyed pa yi yam shing la/ /de bzhin nyid kyi me byung bas/ /thams cad thams cad bsregs sbyangs thim/ /skye med rnam dag

hom khung du/ /skye ba rnam bzhi'i yam shing la/ /ma skyes spros bral me byung bas/ /mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim/ /bsam du med pa'i hom khung du/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yams shing la/ /'od dpag med pa'i me

byung bas/ /mtha' yas rdul snyed bsregs sbyangs thim/ /chos nyid rnam dag hom khung du/ /chos can sna tshogs yam shing la/ /stong nyid ye shes me 'bar bas/ /dngos po'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim/ /sems nyid

rnam dag hom khung du/ /sems can skye 'gro yam shing la/ /rang 'byung ye shes me 'bar bas/ /'khor ba'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim/ /kun gzhi b+ha ga'i hom khung du/ /nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la/ /ye shes lnga yi

me byung bas/ /gzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs sbyangs thim/ /snang srid nam mkha'i hom khung du/ /'byung ba bzhi yi yam shing la/ /phyag rgya 'bar ba'i me byung bas/ /snang srid dngos po bsregs sbyangs shing / /rnam bzhi las kyi hom khung du/ /

bzhi 'am bzhi yi yam shing la/ /rigs bzhi 'bar ba'i me byung bas/ /mchod sbyin dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim/ /'di yang so so'i khyad par gyis/ /phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas/ /gang ltar rigs pa de ltar sbyar/ /shar lho nub byang dkar

ser dmar/ /mthing ga nag po thal mdog sbyar/ /zlum po pad ma le'u tshe bzhi/ /'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas/ /zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang / /gru gsum b+ha ga'i mkha' mngon spyod/ /gsum brtseg mdangs dang ri mor mdzes/ /

las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis brgyan/ /ye shes rdo rje las rgyud ldan/ /bla ma gsum gyi thabs mchog sbyar/ /dag pa'i mtha' mnyes mchog 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar/ /mchod pa nges pa'i 'byor tshogs sbyar/ /rdo rje las kyi byin brlabs

sbyor/ /gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas/ /bshar btab zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang / /rgyas dang dbang bshad rgyud bshad pas/ /lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /de bzhin glu yi rgyud 'byor bya/ /rigs kyi rigs rgyud lnga rnams ni/ /so so rigs su bsher btab

ste/ /klong yangs 'khyil ba'i hom khung du/ /dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/ /sbyang dang thob phyir sreg byar 'os/ /dpag med rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /tsha ba sngags pa'i yon tan dag /rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang / /mnyes par bya ba'i thabs

chen brtsam/ /mnyes pa'i las rnams rdzogs pa dang / /gang yang ma byang don chen rnams/ /grub dang ma grub de rnams dag /me la mkhas pas brtag par bya/ /me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis/ /'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnams drug /

de dag yongs su shes par bya/ /gal te mtshan la mi sdug na/ /yid du mi 'ong rtags yin pas/ /sreg sbyang chen pos rgyas par bya/ /de nas yid 'ong 'dod 'byung ba/ /me la 'dod pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /rnam gsum gang ltar 'grub pa blang / /

'dus pa chen po gzhan yang gang / /ro yi rdzas rnams sreg sbyang na/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang / /shin du dri zhim sna tshogs kyis/ /ro la byug cing bkru bar bya/ /bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis/ /ras la byugs pas ro dkris

pas/ /ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa gang / /de yis mtshan pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /gang du bkod pa de nyid du/ /snying

po grangs kyang de ltar bya/ /snying po dag la so so yi/ /ma nor rtsa ba'i yig 'bru dag /ras sam shing la bris te dgod/ /ro yi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang / /ro yi phyi rgyab thams cad du/ /nyon mongs 'khor ba kun bkod de/ /ras sam shing shun

gang dag la/ /'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod/ /nyon mongs lnga dang dug gsum bcas/ /skye bzhi las lnga rgyu drug rnams/ /ming dang gzugs su byas nas ni/ /gnas gnas dag tu dgod par bya/ /sa bon 'du byed dngos po lnga/ /gzung

'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams/ /brda yi tshul du bkod nas ni/ /ro rnams khyab par dgod par bya/ /de nas ro yi phung po de/ /rten nas glegs ma stegs bu yi/ /steng du mkhas pas bzhag par bya/ /thabs kyi cho ga bya ba yang / /maN dal

'khor yug ran tsam la/ /brko dang kha khyer lugs bzhin bya/ /phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag /thig gis yul gcad so sor dbye/ /de yi steng du bsregs shing brtsig / /dbyibs ni rigs bzhir gtams pa la/ /grwa zur ka bas brtan par

brten/ /sum brtseg yang rtog bar khang bcas/ /tha ma yam shing brdzangs pas gtams/ /bar khang dag gi glegs bam la/ /ro yi bzhin phyogs ro bzhin bstan/ /ro yi steng khang yang thog tu/ /ras la sogs la bris pa yis/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod/ /

ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la/ /rdo rje gzungs gyi rgyud thag bzhis/ /btags nas bla ma'i phyag tu phul/ /shing gi bya ba rdzogs pa dang / /de yi phyi mtha' stegs bu la/ /rnam bzhi las kyi lha rnams dgod/ /stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang / /

rdo rje las kyi sgos btab pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la/ /'khor ba sreg par mnga' gsol te/ /mi g.yo me chen rtse gcig pas/ /me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya/ /rdo rje sngags kyi las sbyar la/ /rnam bzhi las kyi mnga' gsol te/ /las kyi phreng ba

rdzogs par bya/ /bla ma rdo rje dam pa zhig /ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas/ /las kyi bsags pa bgrang zhing gshegs/ /skabs sbyor rdo rje bla ma yis/ /bla med mchod pa rgyun du bya/ /bro gar glu tshig stabs chen gyis/ /mchod pa rol mo sna

tshogs dbul/ /rdo rje las kyi smon lam gdab/ /mchod skabs las kyi mjug tu bya/ /rdo rje las kyi lta 'dzin pas/ /dkar byang las kyi lta bzung ste/ /lags mtha' dam pa rnams la dbul/ /ngo yi nyes mtha' gang 'dzin pas/ /mtshan ma

nag po bud shing dag /ye shes me yi klong du sreg /me sbyor me la gnas pa'i lha/ /me yi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ /me yi lha mo gos dkar mo/ /rgyal ba kun gyi 'od yin te/ /'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur zhing / /thams cad kun gyi drod

bdag yin/ /srid gsum sreg par zhal gyis 'ches/ /dngos po sreg pa'i phrin las ni/ /thugs dam dbang gis yong mi 'da'/ /gang gi sgrib bsreg de nyid mkhyen/ /ro yi rnam shes byang ma byang / /me la mkhas pas de bzhin rtag /mi sdug tshul

'byung sreg sbyang bya/ /gal te legs na me dbang bskur/ /thal ba sku gdung ring bsrel dang / /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la sogs bya/ /dam pa zhig na gdung btags te/ /bla ma'i rten du dbul bar bya/ /'di ni sbyor ba kun gyi mchog /de skad sems dpa'

mchog des smras/ /grogs po dag de dag ni me'i bya bas yongs su shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje gsang ba chos kyi spun/ /me yi bya ba las byung ba/ /gdung zhes grags pa'i sha ri ram/ /dpag med ji srid dus dag nas/ /grangs med sprul pa'i rgyal ba dag /

mya ngan 'das par gyur phyi na/ /med pa las byung sku gdung ni/ /sku yi gdung dang ring bsrel zhes/ /'gro ba'i bsod nams rten du grags/ /rgyal ba rnams ni dngos med pas/ /sku gdung ring bsrel mi srid na/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /

med las thugs rje'i cho 'phrul bzhag /de bzhin gang du gang byung ba'i/ /gang 'dir snang ba sgron ma dag /mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung yang / /sha ri ram zhes grags par 'gyur/ /de yi las kyang de bzhin no/ /de las sogs pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ /

rang 'byung rjes gnas 'byung bcas rnams/ /tshul 'thun gcig par gyur pa yi/ /sku gdung sa bon byin brlabs kyi/ /yon tan cha las rtsir 'phel ba/ /'dzam gling sa khams khyab par snang / /gdung las byung phyir sra mkhregs zlum/ /tha skad

rdo rje rab tu grags/ /lgang bu zur gsum til lgang 'dra/ /gzhon tshe'i mar ram 'o mar snang / /nar son smyin rtags sra zhing mkhregs/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru bzhin du/ /dkar la tsan dmar kha dog gsal/ /zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /bdud rtsi sman gyi

mchog tu grags/ /de bzhin rig 'dzin sems dpa' rnams/ /mi yi lus su sprul pa dang / /gang zag sa pa chos mig ldan/ /bsod nams dpal zhing dag pa dag /sdong bu snying par sbyangs phye na/ /skal ba can la snang ba ni/ /la la dag la sha ri ram/ /la la dag

la ring bsrel sku/ /skal ngan dag la snang mi 'gyur/ /la la snang bar gyur na yang / /sbyor ba dag la yun tu rtag /ma dag nub cig 'bros par 'gyur/ /yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong ba'i/ /'byung ba'i ltas ni ston par byed/ /yod par rtag pa ma yin la/ /med pa rlag par yong mi

'gyur/ /rnal 'byor las dang 'byor pa rnams/ /dag dang ma dag tshul la sbyor/ /de yang bsod nams dag pa yis/ /gang lam rgya cher mos pa dang / /rnal 'byor rtse gcig rmog btud na/ /rdo rjes sbrel dang las 'thun na/ /rgyud rnams yongs su dag la 'bab/ /de yang khyad par

rim pas ni/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung sha ri ram/ /zhing khams kun du khyab bar ni/ /'gar dang bzos ni bzlums pa bzhin/ /byas pa med las snang ba dag /dkar 'tsher mdog gsal 'dzag 'dra ba/ /tsan dmar mdangs su gsal ba yi/ /nam mkha' gang bar char bzhin

'bab/ /rig 'dzin sems dpa' sprul pa'i gdung / /dka' gsal 'ga' 'ga' tsam du 'byung / /gang zag sa pa'i rtags chen ni/ /mdog mnyam gcig gsum gnyis gsum gcig /la lar lnga 'am bcu 'byung zhing / /yon tan de ni de

ltar ro/ /de yang sra mkhregs rdo rje 'dra/ /lcags kyi gtun gyis yong mi chogs/ /'di dag phebs pa'i yon tan yang / /gang dang gang du babs pa yi/ /yul khams de dag thams cad du/ /nad dang mi ngas bgegs rnams zhi/ /gnod sbyin srin po ma rungs pa/ /

drag po gtum po 'ang lhaner 'gyur/ /rgyal po 'khrugs dang khams 'khrugs dang / /yul khams 'khrugs pa 'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /'bras bu lo tog 'phel smin cing / /yid du 'ong ba thams cad 'byung / /yul de rmangs dang rgyal po yi/ /sa bon thams cad bu phor 'gyur/ /

bder bcas mtshan ldan rigs mthon ni/ /bu pho kun kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di dag su la 'chang ba rnams/ /rig 'dzin sa dang skal ba mnyam/ /'jig rten 'di yi bsod nams kyang / /'khor los sgyur rgyal dag dang mnyam/ /de yi dgongs pa kun du 'grub/ /

tshe dang skongs dang las 'grub 'gyur/ /phyin cad bla med byang chub ni/ /sa la reg pa'i rtags chen yin/ /gzhan yang yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /de dag rang gi rang bzhin du/ /gnas pa'i yon tan de dag go/ /bsgrubs na yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /sems can

rnam pa thams cad la/ /byang chub snying po nyid yod pas/ /me yi las kyi bya ba yis/ /lnga phung sbyangs na med mi srid/ /'di dag bsgrub par bya ba yang / /shel gyi za ma tog nang du/ /bsdus te phyag rgya'i rgyas btab nas/ /shel gyi ga bu'i nang du btsa'/ /bsgrub

pas de la smon lam dang / /sgrib sbyang gso la 'phro 'du bya/ /'phro 'du bya ba'i cho ga yang / /nam mkha' gang ba'i sha ri ram/ /zhing khams gang ba'i rgyal ba las/ /char gyi rgyun bzhin de la 'bab/ /rtse gcig bzlas pa gsung gi rgyun/ /ma hA sha ri ram gyi li hU~M/ /

grangs med bar chad med par bzlas/ /mchog tu gsal zhing 'tsher ba dang / /'od kyi zer phreng nyi zer bzhin/ /zang zing brang breng snang bar 'gyur/ /za ma tog gi phyi rol na/ /gsal ba de la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'gul zhing mang por 'phel ba dang / /rgyal ba sems dpa'

rig 'dzin gyis/ /gzugs brnyan shel dang de las ni/ /gsal bar bdag la ston par 'gyur/ /dang po snod de khengs pa yin/ /gnyis pa phyed dam brgya rtsa brgyad/ /tha ma'ang grangs 'gas 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de dag grub pa rtags chen te/ /de tshe dngos

grub blang bar bya/ /thob pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /tshe 'dir rig 'dzin sa la gnas/ /rgyal ba dag dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /zhar las byung ba'i yon tan yang / /'gro ba kun gyi don spyod pa/ /sems dpa' che ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyun du de la

mchod dgos te/ /mchod na yon tan dam pa 'byung / /mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yang / /sgrib sbyangs bsod nams dpung bskyed de/ /rang rgyud dag par byas nas ni/ /zla ba dus ni thams cad kyi/ /bcu drug cha la rdzogs pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid gcig pu sems yul du/ /

gyur par byas nas mchod pa ni/ /za ma tog dang bcas pa dag /rgyal mtshan rtse mor brtags byas te/ /ji ltar 'dod par smon lam btab/ /des ni 'dod pa thams cad skongs/ /de ni rnal 'byor skal ldan gyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /rnal 'byor sgrub

pa'i rdzas mchog tu/ /ming gis med du mi rung ngo / /ji ltar ro dag gser 'gyur dang / /de bzhin me yis bsregs sbyangs bzhin/ /dngos por spyod pa ji snyed pa/ /de nyid dam pa la mi g.yo/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas spyod/ /dngos po bzhi la gnas

spyod pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i chos nyid de/ /spyod pa rmad 'byung dam pa yi/ /ji ltar glang po chur zhugs pa/ /thogs chags 'jigs pa yong med par/ /dga' ba'i longs spyod brod tshul gyis/ /mi ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa yang / /brtul

zhugs rgya mtsho'i chur 'jug pa/ /rtsal chen spyod pa'i brod tshul gyis/ /thogs chags med par la dor ba'o/ /spyod pa gang bar bya ba'i thabs/ /goms pa klong du gyur pa gces/ /grogs po dag de dag ni la dor bar shes par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs

pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor spyod 'jug gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa dam pa rnams la smras pa/ /kye grogs po dag gang gis bcad par bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ dgongs pa dam pa de kho na nyid do/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ dgongs pa de kho na nyid gcig bslabs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bslabs pa'o/ /de kho na nyid gcig la mkhas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa'o/ /de kho na nyid de la goms na bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sgom

pa'o/ /de kho na nyid de las ma 'das na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dam pa bsrungs pa'o/ /de kho na nyid de la zhugs na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o/ /de kho na nyid de la spyod na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yo byad la spyod pa'o/ /de kho na

nyid mngon du byas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgya mtsho snyed byas pa'o/ /de kho na nyid de ma nor bar bstan na chos kyi sgo dpag tu med pa bstan pa'o/ /de kho na nyid de phyin ci ma log par thos na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi sgo thos pa'o/ /

de kho na nyid de mngon du gyur na/ /dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad kyi bcud du bya ba 'am snying por bya ba ni de kho na nyid de de las med pa'i phyir ro/ /grogs po dag de bas na 'di ltar/ /de bzhin nyid kyi don

mthong na/ /mthong bas thams cad sgyu ma yin/ /de nyid go 'phang mchog 'phags na/ /bla med mtho btsun mtha' dag brdzun/ /de bzhin nyid du nges phan chad/ /gang dman spa gong zhum pa med/ /de bzhin nyid du thag chod na/ /'jig rten gnas kyang chos kyi sku/ /

dam par nges kyang 'jig rten 'jug /'khor ba'i mtha' la 'ang skyo ba med/ /mu mtha' yas kyang gcig tu rdzogs/ /bdud kyi khams la nyam mi nga / /mi bzad khams la bag mi tsha/ /'dod pa'i dngos po dbyings la sbyor/ /cig char nges pa'i don mthong na/ /

rim gyis sbyor ba slu 'drid 'dra/ /de la mos pa tsam gyis kyang / /khams gsum zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /klong du gyur pa smos ci dgos/ /dper na seng phrug khyung sgong dag /mig ma bye zhing mar blangs kyang / /kun skrag sgo nga 'am 'khar 'gro ltar/ /de nyid nges par gang

gyur pa/ /de dag 'jig rten gnas 'jug kyang / /go 'phang dam pa de nyid du/ /nges pa ci la 'ang bag mi tsha/ /rim gyis mtshan mar spyod pa dang / /med dang dmigs dang mi dmigs dang / /bsgrub dang bgrod par byed pa yi/ /bye brag med par rtog 'jug pa/ /blun po de dag stongs pa ste/ /dam

par nges pa ga la yin/ /gcan zan tha ma'i phru gu 'dra/ /skrag cing dngang pa'i rang bzhin no/ /mtha' yas ji snyed chos kun gyi/ /rang bzhin ji ltar gnas pa bzhin/ /ma bcos phyin ci ma log pa/ /de bzhin nyid du thag chod pa'o/ /ji ltar khyung chen mkha' lding ba/ /'dab

gshog rtsal gyis nam 'phangs spyod/ /ri brag chu klung mtha' yas kyang / /'phur rlabs 'og tu kun chud ltar/ /rnal 'byor chos nyid mkha' 'gro ba/ /theg pa'i spyod sgo mtha' yas kyang / /ji bzhin ma bcos don gyis na/ /go 'phang rlabs kyis thag bcad pa/ /

'di ni re dang dogs pa yi/ /the tsom gcod pa'i nges pa ste/ /dam pa nyid la lta ba yi/ /go 'phang gcod pa nges par gces/ /grogs por dag de dag ni sa yongs su gcod par bgros par shes par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pas/ dman pa dam pa rnams re dogs med par thag gcod

pa'i go 'phang thob par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las the tshom yongs su gcod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag pos dman pa dam pa rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag gang nyam

rnyed par bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ dgongs pa dam pa kun 'dus la/ /'jug pa'i gtsor ni bsam gtan te/ /'khor los dbang sgyur ji bzhin du/ /chos kun dbang sgyur bsam gtan yin/ /rnal 'byor bsam gtan chen po 'di/ /dug dang mun pa gser 'gyur bzhin/ /thams cad

dbang sgyur bsam gtan yin/ /des na dam pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /gal te bsam gtan 'di med na/ /rgya mtsho 'jings kyi pha bong ltar/ /dpag tu med pa'i sgo bcad kyang / /don med snying po skams pa yin/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i bsam gtan ni/ ji bzhin pa yi de nyid la/ ma bcos pa yi blo

bzhag ste/ /ma yengs skye 'gag med pa'o rnal 'byor dam pa ji bzhin pa/ /sems kyi chos nyid de nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid ces mi dmigs pa/ /rtsa ba'i kun shes kun gzhi nyid/ /ci phyir ma byas ma bcos pa/ /rang 'byung de bzhin nyid ces bshad/ /thams cad kun du snang ba ni/ /'jug pa'i rnam

shes yud tsam nyid/ /ci phyir kun du snang 'jug pas/ /phyi nang kun du snang bar bshad/ /rgyu yi rnam par bkod pa ni/ /'jug pa'i rnam shes sgo lnga nyid/ /thams cad gang gi rgyur bkod pas/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bshad/ /gang gi dgongs pa dam pa ni/ /stong pa ma yin ther

zug med/ /dbu mar mi dmigs kun rig gsal/ /yod min med min las kyang 'das/ /gang 'dir tshor 'gro ma rabs dang / /gang 'gog byis pa'i spyod yul dang / /'di gang nyams pa'i log sred can/ /yal ba phyal ba

dmigs pa gcig /gang 'dir lta bas mdongs pa dag /bdag la brten nas mtha' sgrub ste/ /med mos des 'gro med snyam nas/ /de ma thag tu ngan 'gror 'gro/ /mos pa chung du thams cad ni/ /gang la bdag med rten bzhin mthong / /

gang bkag rtog yod dpyod med pa/ /bsam gtan dang po kho na'o/ /kun stong phra ba'i stong pa las/ /gnas rtog med la dpyod pa gnyis/ /stong pa nyid la nges bzhag ste/ /dga' ba bskyod pa gsum pa'o/ /bdag gam gzhan gyis mthus

bstan te/ /skyon med mi g.yo gnas bzhi pa/ /gang yod mthar yang 'gyur srid kyi/ /gang med gnas med mthar mi 'gyur/ /gang med mi mthong mi shes bzhin/ /btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur yang / /de nyid med par mi 'gyur bas/ /

rgyu 'bras med kyang don med min/ /dper na lcags bsregs dpal med bzhin/ /chen po bzhi med stongs 'gyur kyang / /de dang nam mkha' med min bzhin/ /de nyid mi rlag med min 'gyur/ /drug gi spyod yul mtshan ma ste/ /mtshan ma dngos

por snang bas na/ /ci dgar bzhag pas de bzlog med/ /de stong spang zhing bzlog tu med/ /thams cad sems kyi chos nyid du/ /tshig med lta bas thag chod na/ /ma bcos ma yengs yengs thub snyoms/ /rtsol sgrub re dogs ga la yod/ /mi mthun gnyen

po sgom mi dgos/ /skyon yon spong len bying rgod rnams/ /gang 'dir dbyer med zung 'brel na/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong sems las byung / /zhig pas nam mkha' med mi 'gyur/ /'khyams pas byang chub sems ni stor/ /spangs pas mi spongs mtha'

yas chos/ /bkrus pas mi 'dag stong nyid dbyings/ /gang stong yod pas chad rtag pas/ /thams cad rig pas stong ma yin/ /dngos po med pas rtag ma yin/ /ci yang med pas sbyang du med/ /bya ba thams cad yongs btad na/ /ye nas ma bcos der bzhag na/ /

de med pas na de yang med/ /de ni dam pa'i nyams rnyed pa'i/ /'dir ni theg chen dam pa yi/ /nad ni rim gyis 'thob ma yin/ /rim gyis pa yi dug rgod ni/ /cig car 'char ba'i de kho na'o/ /des na gang dang gang dag gis/ /ji ltar go dang mos

bzhin du/ /bstan pa gang dang gang dag la/ /so so yid brtan yul du bya/ /de bas bsgron ma dpag med kyis/ /dam pa ji snyed gsungs pa rnams/ /gcig tu chad dam nges med / /ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar nges/ /'di la gang 'jug par gcod pa/ /le lo

bya mang rgod pa dang / /g.yeng dang rmugs dang 'dod pa dang / /gnyid dang re dogs the tshom dang / 'du 'phro spyod dang dga' ba'o/ /de yang rang bzhin de bzhin nyid/ /dug lnga la sogs kun 'byung nyid/ /rang 'byung rang zhi de bzhin nyid/ /dam pa'i don la gang

sgrib pa/ /mi g.yo gsal bde sdug bsngal dang / /skye ba gsal ba 'byin pa dang / /des dang khyad snyems 'byung zhi nyid/ /bsam gtan chen por nges snang ba/ /kun tu mi nyams re dogs med/ /dad pa mi skye mi g.yo dang / /ma chags mi 'chad len pa med/ /'khrug pa

med na rang bzhin nyid/ /rnal 'byor bdud kyi spyod yul na/ /dam par 'dun mthong dam par smra/ /sprul pa grangs med 'gyed mthong dang / /dam pas smras kun gsal mthong dang / /dus kun shes gsal mthong ba dang / /rgyud drug lam nas kun snang dang / /

de la gdung ba'i shugs 'byung dang / /kun snang gsal bar mthong ba dang / /ci la 'ang thogs med 'gro ba dang / /mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro 'dug dang / /dam pa'i phyag rgya lung ston dang / /kun gyi skad du chos smra dang / /dngos po brtan g.yo bsti gnas mthong / /

thams cad mnyam par bkod pa dang / /de nyid rang bzhin gsal snang dang / /las su rung ba thogs med dang / /dam pa'i don la bsgo ba dang / /'jig rten gtso bos mchod pa dag /rang bzhin shes na dam pa'i rtags/ /gang mi shes pa log pa'i bdud/ /

sgo drug mtshan ma ci skyes dang / /rang 'byung rang zhi ci dgar gzhag /ma skyes pas na bzlog du med/ /de yang de bzhin de nyid do/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /nyes dang legs pa gang la yang / /dgal dang 'gyod pa'i rtog pa med/ /rang 'byung rang zhi de nyid do/ /

'dir ni dam pa gang nges pa/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ma'i snga ltas yin/ /chu klung me gser ga na bar/ /'du 'phro 'byung rtsi nges pa bzhin/ /dam pa nges na dam par 'byung / /dam pa ma nges thams cad bdud/ /dam par nges na chung ngu tsam/ /gang

'byung dam pa'i snga ltas so/ /gang gi dam pa nyid thos na/ /mi skrag mi dngang dga' ba skye/ /gang zhig dam pa nyid lta ba/ /thams cad dam pa nyid du mthong / /dam pa'i klung du gang gyur pa/ /rnam grangs mang po dam par sdud/ /dam pa nges pa mthong ba na/ /tshig

lam rjes su de mi 'gro/ /de mthong thams cad dam par gsal/ /snang ba med pa'i dam pa ni/ /snang ba med pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nyid kun gyi rgyu yin te/ /cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung / /g.yo dang drod thob brtan pa dang / /gsal dang rtags

thob brtan pa dang / /nyi zer rdul phran smig sgyu dang / /mtsho rlabs rlung dang char gyi rgyun/ /sprin lding ta la gang 'phar 'gro/ /sa g.yo 'byung ba'i skye mched snang / /'byung rgyun zug rngu la sogs la/ /gang gis yongs su nad zhi ba/ /mun pa'i skye

mched choms pa dang / /lus kyi bzod pa thob pa dang / /kun la bde blag ji bzhin pa'o/ /gang min gang du sgyur ba dang / /gang med pa las gang 'byin pa'i/ /yid 'ong 'dod grub rdzas mchog rnyed/ /kun dga' kun 'dud kun yid dang / /kun la

dbang sgyur mchog 'grub ltas/ /yud las sngon du 'byung ba'i ltas/ /sgren mor byung dang rtag par mkhru/ /rnam dag chu bor 'bogs dang rkyal/ /char rgyun bum chu 'byung ba dang / /gseg dang g.yeng dang rnam par 'thor/ /'di gang sbyong ba dag

pa'i ltas/ /gang 'dir 'jigs dang bral ba yang / /g.yul 'gyed zhi dang zug rngu byang / /tha mar grol dang gshed las thar/ /gdug pa'i tshogs bral dug nad zhi/ /bcing grol bcad ltas bzang po yin/ /khyad par dam pa'i sngon byung ba/ /

khri rkang shing dang ljon shing skas/ /'dzeg dang gyen du 'gro ba dang / /ri rtse'i mchod rten nam mkha'i skas/ /gong nas gong du 'phar ba'i ltas/ /gang la gnas dang non pa yang / /khri mthon la 'dug glang chen zhon/ /seng chen khyung lding 'dab chags

dang / /mchod rten rtse dang ri bo'i spos/ /nam mkha'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang / /lus la sprin byung nyi zla la/ /'dug pa gang la gnas pa'i rtags/ /dam pa rigs kyi sngon byung ba/ /bka' rtags dbang por dbang sgyur byed/ /'jig rten skas

la 'bebs pa dang / /dbang bsdud g.yul rgyal rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mgo la me tog thod skyes pa'o/ /chos gang dbang sgyur sngon byung ba/ /glegs bam rnyed dang 'dri spyod dang / /gzhan la ston dang gtan la 'bebs/ /me 'od bum gang lta rtog 'thung / /

nor bu thu dang 'khor lo babs/ /nyin zla zin dang ri rab skor/ /gang la sgra brgyas stong gsum gang / /dngos po'i mtha' dag yi ger mthong / /klags pas ngo mtshar kun skyed dang / /mkha' las me tog char 'bab pa'o/ /dam pa mthong ba sngon byung ba/ /

sngon ma mthong ba yul mthong dang / /stong gsum mthong zhing gling rnams bgrod/ /ri rab rtser phyin thams cad mthong / /nam mkha' mtha' yas mthong ba dang / /rgya mtsho gting du phyin pa dang / /sgron me thogs dang snang srid dpyod/ /nyi ma'i snying po lta bu'o/ /

lung chen thob pa sngon byung ba/ /rol mo 'brug sgra seng ge dang / /chos kyi bgro ba thos pa dang / /gzugs brnyan zhal 'dzum 'od 'byung dang / /dam pa'i gsung thos sku mi mthong / /lha mo glu dbyangs sgrogs pa dang / /gzhal yas dag la sgra 'byung

dang / /grogs po dam pa zhes 'byung zhing / /de nyid 'gro bar byed pa'o/ /rig 'dzin dam pa'i ltas shar na/ /byin brlabs mthu yi cho 'phrul yang / /nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba dang / /ri rab rked nas gsor ba dang / /'jig rten rgyang mar 'phang ba dang / /sreg

pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba la/ /sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kyang / /khyad par rtsal gyis ston par nus/ /'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la/ /so so skad du chos 'thun par/ /'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogs su/ /gang la de ltar ston par nus/ /rnal

'byor rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/ /'jig rten khams kun g.yos nas kyang / /thams cad ngo mtshar cher 'gyur te/ /dga' mgu rangs pa'i ro myong 'gyur/ /g.yeng ba'i yi ge phreng ba las/ /rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra bsgrags pas/ /yid mthong rnam grangs

chos rnams kun/ /sngags snang sngags su ma gyur med/ /rnal 'byor che chung rim pa dag /rtsal gyi khyad par dag las byung / /rim gyis 'jug dang cig car pa/ /dbugs kyi yul dang tsher ba dang / /thos dang mthong ba la sogs te/ /sems

kyi yul dang nam mkha'i dbyings/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge/ /yan lag yi ge so so yi/ /rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas/ /'phro 'du'i tshad dang phyag rgya'i khyon/ /tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhin no/ /

'di ni dang po'i 'jug rims te/ /mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o/ /yi ge ye shes las bskrun te/ /don byed pa 'ang phyag rgyar 'byung / /rgya mtsho gnon dang nam mkha'i skas/ /rlung 'ching ba dang rgyun bzlog pa/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba dang / /

nyi zla zhon nas 'jig rten 'phang / /sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs/ /stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul dang / /gzhig dang spar ba la sogs te/ /bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /goms pas las su rung ba yi/ /rnal 'byor rtsal chen sbyong bar zad/ /

bzlas pa mthar phyin grub pa dang / /bcing ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /bsam pa las su rung ba dang / don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa/ /bya ba yongs su dag pa dag /don gcig yul la so sor snang / /des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang / /de nyid gcig la

sgom mod kyi/ /rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par ni/ /bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te/ /dang po sa la gnas pa yi/ /btsal ba las kyi rnal 'byor pa/ /'dun pa'i sems pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug po/ /shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang

dmas pas/ /ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste/ /de nyid mthong bar mi 'gyur bas/ /rang gi mos pa gang dmigs na/ /de yi sa bon gang yin pa/ /kha dog dbyibs kyi phye nas ni/ /sna yi dbugs la rgyu byas te/ /de yi yul du gyur tshad du/ /'od zer

'bar 'phro gsal ba las/ /'phro 'du gnas su bskyed par bya/ /rang gi chag tshad dang sbyar ba'i/ /sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/ /gnyis pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/ /bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi po/ /ting 'dzin

rtsal gyi khyad par gyis/ /sa bon rang bzhin yi ge la/ /'od zer 'bar ba bcas pa de/ /dri 'byung sgo ni tshun chad du/ /'phro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las/ /rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i/ /sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/ /gsum pa'i sa

la gnas pa yi/ /rnal 'byor lung gi bka' sgo la/ /sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam gsum po/ /dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod/ /lha yi sa bon gang yin pa/ /rang bzhin yi ger bsgyur byas te/ /'od zer 'bar dang bcas pa yis/ /

thos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du/ /'phro 'du gsal bar byas pa las/ /rang gi chag tshad bzhi 'gyur tsam/ /sku yi khyon yang de tsam mo/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhin/ /lha yi khyad par gang yin pa/ /yi ge'i rim pa bzhin sbyar nas/ /

'phro 'du tshad kyang de bzhin te/ /rim pa ji bzhin sbyar nas kyang / /'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang / /sems kyi yul ni ji tsam du/ /sku yi khyon gyi khyad par yang / /chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas/ /sku yi khyon gyis gang ba'o/ /ji ltar

gser sbyangs 'tsher ba bzhin/ /sems nyid sbyangs pas de nyid gsal/ /'phro 'du sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 'di/ /rim gyis sbyong la cig car drod/ /lang ka'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ /chos rgyun chen po 'di 'dzin 'di/ /sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas bshad/ /

'di kun 'phro 'du'i rgyun zhes bya/ /nam mkha' don gyi glegs bam la/ /sna tshogs rig pa'i yi ge bris/ /'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas/ /theg chen gsang sngags rgyun mi 'chad/ /chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni/ /de bzhin nyid las

ma g.yos pas/ /thams cad bdud rtsir rgyun mi 'chad/ /'khor ba rgya mtsho yo byad rnams/ /mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin te/ /srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun/ /kun bzang mchod sprin rgyun mi 'chad/ /kun gyi de bzhin nyid dbyings las/ /sems

can sangs rgyas snying por shar/ /'gro gang bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /rang 'byung sangs rgyas rgyun mi 'chad/ /dngos po brtan g.yo la sogs pa'i/ /sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /kun kyang gsang sngags gsang ba'i tshig /bzlas pa rgya mtsho rgyun

mi 'chad/ /de dang de yi dbyings nyid la/ /gang dang gang gi thabs sbyor ba/ /ye nas 'du 'bral med pas na/ /sbyor ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad/ /srid gsum bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag /stong pa'i mtshon cha'i rgyal po yis/ /dngos po med

par bsad pas na/ /ye sgrol chen po rgyun mi 'chad/ /snang srid dag pa'i gzhal yas su/ /kun gzhi dpal gyi maN Dal la/ /rnam shes thig chen srad bu brgyad/ /ye btab dkyil 'khor rgyun mi 'chad/ /'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la/ /gzugs

khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan/ /gzugs med bum rten bum par bcas/ /gdung chen chos sku rgyun mi 'chad/ /nam mkha' me chu sa rlung rnams/ /rmang bzhi ri rab rten du snang / /bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams/ /de nyid bang rim khri 'phang brten/ /

ri bo bum rten bum par bcas/ /'di yang gdung chen rgyun mi 'chad/ /'dzugs pa'i yan lag gzhi rmang rten/ /'khor lo tshigs chen khri 'phang brtan/ /yan lag dang po bum rten bcas/ /lcang lo cod pan phreng bas klubs/ /de bzhin nyid kyi sa gzhi

la/ /ji bzhin pa yi gzhal yas khang / /ma nor ma bcos rmang chen brtan/ /byang chub sems kyi brtsig chen gtams/ /ye shes lnga'i skar mthongs gsal/ /bsdu ba tshad med rnam thar sgo/ /dran pa yang dag them skas/ brgyad/ /rdzu 'phrul rta babs dag

gis brgyan/ /mi 'jigs rig pa'i gdung chen la/ /yang dag brgyad kyi ka bas mdzes/ /rang 'byung ye shes dbu rtse 'phags/ /don gnyis khyams kyis nges par mdzes/ /ye shes thugs rje yon tan las/ /byin brlabs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan/ /

chos nyid rlabs kyi bla re bres/ /sil snyan sgra sgrogs theg chen sngags/ /ji bzhin chos kyi pho brang 'dir/ /rgyal ba bzhugs pa 'di ltar rim/ /kun bzang sems kyi chos nyid las/ /kun gzhi ma 'dres yongs rdzogs chos/ /sems dpa' yud kyis

nges thob pas/ /bstan pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad/ /rdo rje nam mkha'i skas bgrod nas/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /snang srid mtha' thug med la lta/ /des ni de yul yangs par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams byas te/ /de la gnas

pa'i sems can la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' brtan byas te/ /thams cad dam pa'i rdo rjer bya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ling ga la/ /zla ba dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /myur mgyogs chu zla'i 'phen shugs kyis/ /zhing khams kun du

bgrod par bya/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi ling ga la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shin du nges par gyur pa dang / /mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gsal/ /rnal 'byor sdigs mdzub rtse mo la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal

'bar/ /shin du brtan par red pa dang / /chu des sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil/ /rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor du/ /stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su 'phangs nas ni/ /sa nas sar ni spang bar bya/ /

rnal 'byor sdigs pa'i mdzub mo la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba las/ /zer las nyi ma 'bum 'phros pas/ /phyi nang mun pa thams cad gsal/ /rnal 'byor lag gi dkyil 'khor las/ /chu zla'i dkyil 'khor rab gsal bas/ /bdud rtsi

chu bo'i rgyun byung bas/ /sreg pa'i dmyal ba'i me chen bsad/ /gzhan yang lang ka'i bdag po ting 'dzin gyi mdo ni 'di kho nar 'dus par gsungs pas/ /'di kho na ltar shes par bya'o/ /sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te/ /ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang / /

de ma thag par ma gyur kyang / /de nyid gang brtags de ltar snang / /gdos bcas yul na mi snang yang / /yid gzugs mngon shes kun mkhyen snang / /gang brtags de ltar de ltas nas/ /mngon sum gsal por red par 'gyur/ /yod med legs nyes

rang bzhin rnams/ /chu khams rtas pa lta bur zad/ /thams cad 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /des na ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso/ /dper na rgya mtsho nor len mi/ /sbrul dang chu srin sbrang ma la/ /sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun/ /dka' bas nyams

su blangs pas 'grub/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rnal tshol ba/ /rnam rtog bying rmugs 'phyar g.yeng dgra/ /gzhom par dka' ba'i las 'di dag /nyams su blangs na bde thob rnyed/ /'di ni ting 'dzin dam pa yi/ /nyams su blangs pa'i bslab pa ste/ /

sems nyid goms par bya ba las/ /'dris par byed pa rab tu gces/ /grogs po dag de dag ni nyams rnyed pa nyid du shes par bya'o/ /de skad ces smras pas/ /dman pa rnams gang gi dgongs pa dam pa'i nyam drod rnyed par gyur to/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las rnal 'byor dbang sgyur gyi le'u zhes bya ste bdun bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po des dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces smras

so/ /grogs po dag gang 'di la tshegs chung bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ci la yang bya ba med pa nyid do/ /gang la bya ba med pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /'di lta ste/ sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad/ /

gang la 'ang gnod par byed mi nus/ /de bzhin nyid kyis zin pa yi/ /dus gsum dug lngas gnod mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid kyis ma zin na/ /lam gyi phyogs rnams kun spyad kyang / /bde 'gro tsam du nges 'byung gi/ go 'phang dam par ga la

'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid kyis kun gnas par/ /gang shes nyon mongs rnam par grol/ /gang de zin par ma shes na/ /dam pa'i lam rnams grol mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor de nyid blo ldan pas/ /nyon mongs zin pas gang spyad kyang / /rnam grol rang

'byung mya ngan 'das/ /tshegs med gyi 'da' don po che/ /gang 'di blo dang mi ldan pas/ /blo ldan tshul du gang byed pa/ /dam par grol bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /'ching ba thar ram 'khor ba'i dngos/ /thams cad stong par shes pa yi/ /blo can mya ngan

'das pa ste/ /bya ba'i las la sha thang ba'i/ /tshegs chen dka' ba las dang bral/ /dam pa'i blo gros thabs med de/ /skyes bu dam pa rnams dang ni/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis dman pa'i lus/ /sten par byed pa 'ang ltung bar 'gyur/ /dam pa'i blo

gros thabs yod na/ /'khor ba dman pa'i dngos po yang / /skyes bu dam par grol 'gyur te/ /grol ba rang 'byung gzhan las min/ /grol dang ma grol la sogs pa/ /gnyis su rtog pa thams cad mtha'/ /kun mkhyen rnams ni dbus la 'ang

min/ /de ni grol med grol ba'o/ /'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/ /ma rtogs blo chung kun la gsang / /skyon yod nyes pa ma yin te/ /blo chung rnams la phan phyir ro/ /de phyir blo gros thabs ldan la/ /rtsol sgrub yo byad gtsor ma gsungs/ /gal te byas na 'ang

'gag pa med/ /ma byas na yang de ltar nges/ /de ltar blo gros thabs ldan na/ /mtshams med lnga yi sems can kun/ /byang chub snying rje mtshon gyis bsad/ /dpag med dger 'gyur ma bsad na/ /kun gyis don du gnyer ba ni/ /gang gi sems nyid dbyings nyid kyi/ /

gang gis bskal pa dpag med du/ /srid gsum dkrugs pas de rig min/ /'dir ni blo gros thabs ldan pas/ /bya med gyi 'dar rang rig pas/ /don chen rnal 'byor nyal mo btsun/ /ma bal lhun gyis grub pa yin/ /ji ltar mun pa dug dang rdzas/ /sman

snang gser du gyur pa na/ /'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis/ /dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pa/ /sdug bsngal spyad kyang mi 'grub ste/ /su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i mis/ /tshegs med gyi 'da'i tshul gyis na/ /bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar/ /

rnal 'byor chen po don 'grub pa/ /de nyid blo gros thabs dag dang / /gang dang mi ldan pa dag gis/ /dka' ba spyad kyang 'grub min te/ /sems kyi gsang 'di sus mthong ba/ /blo gros thabs dang ldan pa ste/ /'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa/ /de dag

tshegs med gyi 'das 'grub/ /don rnams grub par gang byed pa/ /blo gros thabs kyis grub pa'i phyir/ /don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yi/ /bslab pa 'di dag rab tu gces/ /grogs po dag de dag ni tshegs chung la don che ba nyid du zhes bya'o/ de skad ces

smras pas/ /dman pa rnams blo dang ldan gros kyis chod de thabs kyis zin par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i mdo chen po las don nges par bsgrub ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang gsang ba ba'i bdag

po nges/ lang ka'i bdag po la sogs pa dman pa'i lus kyi sems dpa' rnams la shin du rngom brjid tshul du bos te smras pa/ kye grogs po dag mdo gcig tu bsdus pa ni gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyur par 'dus nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa gcig tu 'dus par bshad pa/ / chos nyid rnam par

dag pas na/ /chos kun rang bzhin rnam par dag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /thugs dam dbyig mchog rab nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa las de skad ces 'byung ba'o/ /de ltar na yang 'di lta ste/ /mi phyed rdo rje dam tshig ni/ /

rdo rje de bzhin nyid las byung / /chos nyid rdo rje dam tshig ni/ /grub na 'jig pa'i dus med do/ /grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las de skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po dag yang 'di lta ste/ /rgyal po kun gyi thugs dam ni/ /

thams cad dam pa de nyid las/ /mi gzhan gzhan med yod ma yin/ /de las gang yang 'da' mi 'gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das rdzogs longs spyod pa ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /yang grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dam pa rnams kyis gsungs

pa'i tshig /rdo rje go cha dam bcas pa/ shin du dam pa'i tha tshig 'di/ /gal te 'das na tshig par gyur/ / bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i sku ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /yang grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa 'di/ /gsungs pas

dam tshig mtha' yas kun/ thams cad thams cad bsrungs pa ste/ /bsrung ba 'di ni rnyed par dka'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rgyun gyi 'byung ba ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ / zhe sdang ngo bo tha dad pa/ / byang chub sems su

mnyam pas na/ / de bzhin nyid las gzhan pa yin/ /ma spangs ma dag rdo rje dam/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ / grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ 'dod dang chags pa'i yul nyid ni/ /rang bzhin gang yin de bzhin

nyid/ / longs spyod myong tshor rnam par dag / spyod la ma chags rdo rje dam/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od mtha' yas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ / yang 'di lta ste/ / thams cad de bzhin der mtshungs pas/ / khyad par bye brag dbyer med pa'i/ /rdo rje nam mkha'

'od gsal bas/ /rmongs pa'i mun nag rnam dag gsal/ /bcom ldan 'das snang mdzad ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /yang 'di lta ste/ rnam dag thug mtha' mu med pas/ /yangs dog tshig gi mtha' dang bral/ /kun bzangs yangs pa'i

lam du gcig /bde chen klong yang rdo rje dam/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad grub pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /yang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid las med pas na/ /yin dang ma yin gnyis las 'das/ /bdag med rdo rje de bzhin nyid/ /nga med mi 'gyur rdo rje dam/ /

bcom ldan 'das yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po dag gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ yod mthong snang grags chos so cog /tha dad sna tshogs mtha' yas kyang / /rang bzhin ma bcos de bzhin nyid/ /

ma bsgribs 'od gsal rnam dag zhing / /bcom ldan 'das dri med sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ kun du bzang po'i ye shes 'di/ /sus kyang ma byas rang 'byung ste/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i rtsa bas na/ /rang las byung ba'i

dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog sprin ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gzhan yang dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/ ye nas ma bcos ji bzhin pa/ /chos so cog ni snying po ste/ /med pa las byung sna tshogs snang / /

snang med de bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /bcom ldan 'das bkod pa'i 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ rang 'byung rig pa'i sems nyid kyis/ /ma bcos chos nyid dbyings kyi don/ /lhun grub thabs dang

shes rab las/ /yang dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsal/ /bcom ldan 'das seng ge sgra ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad ces gsungs so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i tog ngo bo dag pas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /bde dang mi bde

rnam pa kun/ /de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pas/ /tshor ba bde sdug gang yang med/ /ces gsungs so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa'i rgyan ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de bzhin nyid du don bstan du/ /de bzhin nyid du kun gcig pas/ /gang gis gang

la gang zhig bstan/ /nyid la nyid gleng kho nar zad/ /ces gsungs so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid la/ /dus gsum dus bzhir mi rigs te/ /ye shes rig pa'i

khyad par las/ /skad cig bskal pa de skad cig /ces gsungs so/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ 'khor ba mya ngan 'das rtag pa de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid du/ /ye nas mya ngan 'das pas na/ /

rang bzhin lhun grub tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ chos so cog gi rang bzhin ni/ /ma skyes pa las thams cad skye/ /skyes pa nyid na skye ba med/ /rigs mchog rdo rje skye gnas

dam/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das yongs su dgongs pa'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /de bzhin nyid du kun rig na/ /des khyab gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing / /yon tan rin chen sprin bkod pa/ /dgod par bya ba ci

yang med/ ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das gser gyi 'od zer ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams/ /ji bzhin de bzhin nyid la bzhugs/ /de bzhin nyid dang thams cad kyang / /gnyis med de

bzhin de nyid do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /so sor snang ba ma yin te/ /ji bzhin de bzhin nyid des na/ /de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med/ /

ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das zhi ba'i dbang po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /de bzhin nyid kyi de nyid ni/ /dpag cing gzhal bar mtha' yas pas/ /dpag med rgyal po'i pho brang yin/ /de nas kun bkod der gcig

nas/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das sprin gyi dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul yang / /cir yang 'gyur ba'i ye shes te/ /gdos par gyur ba'i chos med pas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du

'byung / /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das yid 'ong dbyangs ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ 'jig rten 'khor ba'i kha brgyud pas/ /ma rig ngo bo de bzhin pa/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/ /de nyid rig na bde chen gnas/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das me long 'od snang ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /nyon mongs ye shes lngar rtog pa/ /ji bzhin de la gnyis ka sgrib/ /rtog dang mi rtog gnyis med de/ /rtog pa de nyid yang dag lam/ /zhes gsungs so/ /

yang bcom ldan 'das zla 'od dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /theg pa dpag med bstan pa yang / /ji ltar mos pa tha dad pa/ /khrid pa bya ba'i thabs su zad/ /rdo rje theg pa nyid las med/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das nyi

ma'i snying po dpal ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ /gang gis de mthong mthong ma thag /mi shes chod pa'i dra ba chod/ /khyung dang seng ge ji bzhin du/ /mngal ltar lus kyi mngal gyis sgrib/ /ces gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das spos kyi rgyal

po ngo bo nyid dag pas 'di skad du/ dbang sgyur thabs kyi ye shes kyis/ /sgyu ma'i chos la dbang thob pas/ /mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du/ /thams cad dbang sgyur rang rig yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das sngon spro ba'i rgyal po ngo bo nyid

dag pas 'di skad du/ rnam dag ye shes sgyu ma dang / /log rtog mtshan ma'i sgyu ma gnyis/ /rang bzhin de nyid dag pas na/ /gnyis su shes pa nyid tshogs rdzogs/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das rin chen rgyal po ngo bo nyid dag

pas 'di skad du/ /bsam gyis mi khyab chos 'di rnams/ /de bzhin nyid du gcig pas na/ /gang gi de bzhin de shes pa/ /kun la dbang sgyur thob pa yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dpal ngo bo nyid pas 'di skad du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs
