du ste/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad mor ldan/ /de ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /skyed pa yang ni 'di lta ste/ /lha tshogs bdag gi sras su skyed/ /de nas bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na/ /thog mar

yab yum mkha' rnam gnyis/ /rdo rje pad mar byin gyis brlab/ /gnyis med dgyes par 'khril pa las/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a/ /'phro 'du dbyings su thim pa las/ /dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur/ /a ya~M ba~M su bru~M/

a nyid 'dus pas nam mkhar gsal/ /ya~M las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /ba~M las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bskyed/ /su las gser gyi bris mar bskyed/ /bru~M las ri rab gzhal med khang / /dbyibs dang kha dog tshad dpag

med/ /'khor lo'i gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra ba'o/ /de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa ni/ /brtan 'byung mkha' yi yi ge a/ /'phel 'grib med par gnas pa ste/ /gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro

'du la/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga / /tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I u U e ai o au/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /

spro bsdu gsal bar gyur pa las/ /thugs mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar/ /de las mngon rdzogs skur gsal ba/ /tha la sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga/ /phung po lnga yi sa bon yin/ /tha la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga/ /bskyed
pa'i sa bon yin par grags/ /ka la sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga/ /rnam shes lnga yi sa bon yin/ /tsa la sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga/ /mig gi khams la sogs pa lnga/ /pa la sogs pa'i 'byung ba lnga/ /gzugs
sogs skye mched rnam lnga'i yin/ /ya la sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi/ /dus bzhi'i sa bon rab tu grags/ /sha la sogs pa'i yig 'bru bzhi/ /phyin ci ma log dus bzhir bshad/ /i la sogs pa'i yig 'bru drug /

rdul snyed thub pa drug tu bshad/ /\u0f00 ni yid kyi khams yin te/ /k+Sha ni yid kyi rnam shes khams/ /\u0f00 ni chos kyi khams su bshad/ /so so'i thugs mtshan gsal ba las/ /sa bon rnams kyis mngon rdzogs bskyed/ /\u0f00 hU~M

badzra d+h+rI ka /swA ra rat+na d+h+rI ka /\u0f00 A ro li ga /hA pradz+nyA d+hI ka / m+'u~M d+hA twI shwa ri/ lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/ mA~M mo hA ra ti/ pyA~M rA ga ra ti/ tA~M badzra ra ti/ k+Shi hi rA dza ya/ trA~M A gar+b+ha aHhrIH ha hU~M pad+ma/ dzri ku ru ban+na hrI/ hU~M lA s+ye/ trA~M mA le+e/ hrI gI hi/ a nr-i t+ya/

mai d+ha ra Ni/ th+l+hIM ni swa ra~M b+ha ya/ swa ra tsa ya/ mU~M shrI A~M rA ga ya/ dzaH d+hU pa/ hU~M puSh+pa/ ba~M dI pa hoH gan+d+he/ hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-i ta/ hU~M pad+mA~M ta kr-i ta/ hU~M big+h+nA~M ta kr-i ta/ dzaH badzra kro d+hi/ hU~M rat+na kro d+hi/ ba~M pad+ma kro d+hi/ hoHkaR+ma kro d+hi/

hU~M badzra tsit+ta/ a badzra sa ma ya/ mu ne kriM/ mu ne sru~M/ mu ne tra~M/ mu ni bra~M/ mu ne k+Sha/ mu ne ye/ de ltar so so'i snying po yis/ mngon rdzogs skur ni gsal ba dang / /ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur te/ /sku gsung thugs su byin gyis

brlab/ /\u0f00 mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ \u0f00 ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ \u0f00 ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ \u0f00 ma hA pra t+ya pra bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/

\u0f00 ma hA kra t+yA nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ \u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ \u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ \u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ \u0f00 sa

rba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku mchog thugs mtshan bzhugs tshul dang / /thor tshugs la sogs cha lugs kun/ /rang bzhin kun rdzob dkyil 'khor 'di/ /
rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal yin te/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/ /yang na gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor la'o/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin zhes bya ba/ /de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kun/ /yum mkha' las

gsal bar bsgom/ /rnal 'byor rig pa'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur bar mthong ngo / /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa

glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gzugs brnyan lta bu rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pa yid ches par bya ba'i phyir 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i

rnam pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam par snang zhing de las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra bar bya yis nyon cig /de la

'di ni rgyud kyi rnam grangs so/ /mi shes pa yi 'gro ba la/ /mtshon pas gsal ba'i don ston phyir/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/ /de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ /brtan zhing mdzes pa'i khang bu la/ /'jam por zhal

zhal byas nas ni/ /kha dog lnga yi gzugs bris pa/ /de yang dngos grub rten du bshad/ /ras sam gro gam shing shun nam/ ta la'i lo ma'am dur khrod ras/ /zhing chen ras la sogs pa la/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su

bris na yang / /mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du bshad/ /rdo dang shel rdo la sogs dang / /dung ngam ba so'i rgyu las ni/ /phyag rgya 'am gzugs su 'bur btod nas/ /de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten/ /gser dngul zangs khar la sogs
la/ /mkhas pas legs par lugs byas te/ /yan lag ma nyams gzugs byas na/ /de yang mtshan ma'i rten du bshad/ /blag sha byang chub shing bu 'am/ /rgyu shing mnyen la gzugs byas na/ /de rnams mtshan ma'i

rten du bshad/ /sbyin zhing mnyen pa'i rgyu rnams la/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su legs byas na/ /de yang mtshan ma'i rten yin no/ /sa steng dbyibs legs mdzes pa la/ /rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams kyis/ /brnyan

ma'i dkyil 'khor byas na yang / /de yang dngos grub rten du bshad/ /re shig las kyi dang po las/ /sa stengs dkyil 'khor byas par shis/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid de/ sa stegs bya ba'i gnas

mchog kyang / /skyon yon bye brag shes pa las/ /spang blang gnyis su shes par bya/ /ri bo ri bran 'dus pa'i spyi/ /gangs ri brag dkar 'dab rtsa ni/ /seng gcan 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/ /zhi ba'i las la de shis so/ /phug chen

dgon pa chen po dang / /brag chen rdo rje gtams pa'i dkyil/ /gcan can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/ /mngon par spyod pa sgrub pa'i gnas/ /dur khrod gnas dang ngam grog dang / /sum mdo grog le bshung ba'i gnas/ /dur

gcan 'khra ba'i gnas bya'o/ /dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i gnas/ /nags tshal mang po bstibs pa dang / /shin tu btsan dang 'jigs pa'-i ngos/ /stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/ /'dod pa sgrub pa'i gnas yin no/ /

mtsho gli chu mdo rgya mtsho'i 'jings/ /chu yi gle ma btsan pa'i gnas/ /chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas zhes bya/ /las rnams kun la de shis so/ /ri bo bdun pa'i rtse rnams dang / /tsan dan nags tshal me tog tshal/ /yid 'ong
bkra shis nyams dga' yi/ /gnas su dkyil 'khor bri bar shis/ /gnam dang sa dang bar snang rnams/ /legs par brtags te dkyil 'khor bya/ /tshon cha lnga yi dbyibs dag tu/ /brtags na mngon pa'i nam mkha'

shis/ /bar snang kha dog rnam lnga po/ /so sor ma 'dres gsal ba shis/ /sa gzhi shin tu ma nyams dang / /ma grum mnyam par gnas pa la/ /tshwa sgo sa slan ba tshwa med/ /de ltar brtags par las bya'o/ /spang bar bya ba'i

gnas ngan no/ /gshin rje gdug pa'i mdung rjes dang / /srin po dus pa'i mchi rjes dang / khro bo gnod sbyin lcam rjes dang / ma mo rngam pa'i sbar rjes dang / 'byung po rku ba'i 'dzol sa dang / /gdug pa klu yi rgyun srang dang / /skyon

can rgyu ba'i lam srang dang / /zhang blon gdug pa'i 'dug sa dang / /kha nas ma tho'i 'dun sa dang / /nyen dang 'brel ba'i gnas rnams ni/ /sbrul gdug pang du 'ongs pa ltar/ /wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yis/ /lo yi

bshugs te rab tu spang / /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni sa bslang ba'i las te/ de nas bslang ba'i las rnams kyang / /mngon dang mi mngon bdag po la/ /rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'-i phyir/ /ser sna spangs pa'i sems kyis ni/ /

rin dang bden pas bsgo la bslang zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni sa gzung ba ste/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis/ /rdo rje dril bur ldan pa yis/ /rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun tu bskor/ /khros pas hU~M gi nga rgyal bya/ /

dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs/ /dengs shig ces su bsgo nas kyang / /seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad pa/ /khro bor byin brlabs gdab par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni sa'i lha mo spyan drang / ba'o/ /

de nas dpang gyur lha mo de/ /spyan drangs bskyed dang gnyis min par/ /mchod bstod tshul bzhin byas nas ni/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub pa po/ /bdud btul mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshe/ /ru tra tshogs kyis rgal

ba la/ /dgyes pa'i las kyi don bgrangs te/ /bdag cag sa la bgrod pa'i tshe/ /ru tra'i rgol ba byung ba na/ /spyan ldan de la dpang bcol lo zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rtags brtag pa'o/ /mtshan mas mtshan ma

gzhom pa'i phyir/ /ro lnga mtshan nyid brtag par bya/ /dge ba'i rtags na dngos grub 'byung / /gal te shes par ma gyur na/ /thabs la mkhas pas spang bar bya/ /yang na sbyin sreg bya bar brtag ces shes gsungs

so/ / de la 'di ni rin chen gter sba ba'o/ /gnas de bsod nams gter ldan phyir/ /rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang / /spos lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga/ /ga 'u'i nang du blugs nas su/ /sa gzhi gter dang ldan par bya zhes

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'o/ /sa zhag spos chen rnam lnga yi/ /khu ba sres nas kun tu ni/ /gru bzhi dbyibs su legs byas te/ /ba ko tsam du brkyang nul bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi/ /sngags

dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya/ /des kyang dngos po kun sbyangs te/ /rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas rang bzhin du/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang bar bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni lha sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas lha
rnams ji snyed pa/ /rang bzhin kun rdzob spyan drangs te/ /spos kyi dkyil 'khor lha grangs bzhin/ /gdan sar byas te yon mchod la/ /lan gcig gshegs zhes sta gon bya/ /de nas 'dus pa'i sems can kun/ /

gsang dang snying kar bram pa dang / /ku sha brim dang srung skud gdags/ /so shing brim dang rmyi ltas brtag /mchod pa'i yo byad ji snyed dang / /rgyan du 'os pa'i rnam pa kun/ /tshang bar bsogs te byin gyis brlab/ /
'dus pa'i sems can de dag kun/ /chos gtam rim pas dbugs phyung ste/ /gsang sngags che ba'i yon tan bshad/ /ces gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i dus so/ /rig byed dag gi yan lag

las/ /dus rnams shes par bya ba ni/ /bkra shis lha yi nyi ma dang / /'byor ldan dus tshod bzang ba ni/ /mtshan ma'i rtog pa yin mod kyang / /brtags na dngos grub mtshan ma 'byung zhes gsungs so/ /de la

'di ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /tshon dang thig skud rnam lnga la/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs te/ /sprul pa 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad/ /spos sam lce pog dkar po yi/ /dud pas rgyun mi bcad par bdug /khros

pas drag po'i sngags zlos shing / /khro bo khro mo'i stangs kyis bskor/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul/ /thig skud sar pa gtsang ma 'am/ /gsang ba'i lcang lo 'khril mdangs sam/ /rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs

la/ /yum gyi grangs dang 'thun par bsgrim/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i lu gu rgyud/ /byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab/ /thig g.yog las kyi sems ma ste/ /mtshan ldan byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa yis/ /rang

bzhin dkyil 'khor gnam thig gdab/ /de nas sa thig gdab pa yang / /'dul ba'i dbang gi bye brag las/ /maN Dal tshad ma nges pa med/ /sor bzhi pa nas brtsam nas su/ /ji srid dpag tshad thub par ro/ /\u0f00 dz+nyA na

tsakra su tra ma ti kra ma hU~M zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o/ /rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra dang / /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de 'dra bar/ /brnyan ma yang ni de 'dra bri/ /tshon sna 'bras dang 'byung khungs sam/ /rdo

khams rin chen dag la bya/ /sna gsum sna lnga dag dang ni/ /rin chen phung po'i tshon gyis ni/ /dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin/ /sgo la rnam lngas bskor bar bya/ /phyag rgya gzhan la rkyang bas so/ /dkar dmar ser ljang
nag po rnams/ /go rims de yis bkod par bya/ /gtso bo gzugs su rdzogs par bri/ /'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu bya/ /phal pa dag la yig 'brus so zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan

dgod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan dang gdugs/ /pi bang gling bu brdab pa dang / /rdza rnga mu kun rnga chen dang / /da rnga ra dang mu tsar dang / /dbyangs dang gar dang bzhad pa che/ /rol

mo'i yo byad ji snyed pas/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor dag la brgyan/ /bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /gser dang dngul las byas pa'o/ /rigs dang 'thun pa'i gos kyis dkris/ /me tog 'bras bus brgyan pa la/ /bdud rtsi

lnga yi gang byas pa/ /sman dang rin chen 'bru rnam lngas/ /gang ba brgyad dam bcu drug gzhag /dkyil 'khor bdag pos mngon bsngags pa'i/ /rnam rgyal bum pa de bzhin du/ /dbus nyid du ni gzhag par bya/ /yang na

bum pa'i skyin par ro/ /zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang / /btung ba rab tu snum po dang / /dbang po kun nas 'byung ba rnams/ /sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pas/ /gang ba'i ban da de bzhin gzhag /rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dgram/ /de la

sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /ci rigs rnams kyis mdzes par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di dag ni 'phen sbud kyi las spyir bstan pa'o/ /de nas sngags pa mnyam bzhag ste/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ /

gsal ba gnyis med dkyil 'khor du/ /rang bzhin kun rdzob spyan drangs dang / /dbab dang zhug dang brtan pa dang / /mi g.yo dam tshig zil gnon dang / /phyag 'tshal mchod pa brjod pa dang / /gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor

du/ /'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang / dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya/ /des ni tshe 'di nyid la yang / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa rgyud

kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de chos thams cad

lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya las mi 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya dam tshig gi mtshan nyid rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gsang sngags rgya mtsho chen po 'di/ /phyag

rgya bsam yas ji snyed pa/ /mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus/ /dang por phyag rgya chen po ste/ /gnyis pa dam tshig rgya yin no/ /gsum pa chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po sku yi rgya/ /rang bzhin

chos sku dngos med rgya/ /gzugs sku mtshan ma'i rgya zhes bshad/ /gzugs sku rang bzhin kun rdzob dang / /bsgom dang bskyed pa yin par bshad/ /gnyis pa'i rgya la gsum yod de/ /bsgom dang gzung dang bcing ba'o/ /bsgom

pa dam tshig gsung yin te/ /gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlab pa'o/ /gzung ba thugs mtshan nyid gzung ba'o/ /dam tshig lag rgya bcing bar bshad/ /yang na so so'i gtso gzung rnams/ /sbyor thabs phyag rgya nyid yin no/ /

gsum pa'i rgya la gsum yod de/ /rang bzhin bsgom dang bzlas brjod do/ /rang bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ /chos kyi dbyings su rgyal bas gsungs/ /bsgom pa mtshan ma'i yig 'bru dag /lce steng snying ka mkha' sogs

su/ /mtshan ma'i rnam pa gsal ba'o/ /rtsa ba bskyed dang bzlas pa yis/ /snying po tshig brjod bzlas pa'i rgya/ /bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgya la/ /rnam pa gsum du dpa' bos gsungs/ /bsgom dang 'phro 'du bcing ba'o/ /las

kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gang / /bsgom pa sgom pa las kyi rgya/ /lta 'og mkha' 'am thugs ka nas/ /rnam bzhi las kyi 'phro 'du ni/ /'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya bca' dang stangs tshul rnams/ /bcing ba las

kyi phyag rgya bshad/ /lag brgya dam tshig phyag rgya rnams/ /rang gi sku ru rnam sgoms nas/ /bcings shing mkha' la rnam dkrol na/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos

ci dgos/ /bdag nyid phyag rgya cher bsgom pa/ /dbu ni rnam par snang mdzad de/ /lag g.yas rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya/ /lag g.yon rin chen 'byung ldan rgya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa snang mtha' yas/ /rkang g.yas las kyi sems dpa'i

rgya/ /yan lag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bas/ /bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /sor mo rnams la bsgom bya ba/ /gung mo gnyis la \u0f00 dang la~M/ /'dzub mo gnyis la hU~M dang mu~M/ /dbang mo gnyis la swa dang ma~M/ /chung ngu gnyis la \u0f00

dang pa~M/ /sbom po gnyis la ha~M dang tra~M/ g.yas pa'i 'bru gdan nyi ma ste/ /g.yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /\u0f00 dang mu~M du rtse sbyar te/ /de bzhin hU~M dang la~M du sbyar/ /ha~M dang pa~M yang de bzhin te/ /a~M dang ta~M du sbyar ba la/ /rgyab sbyar

swa dang ma~M bsgreng ba/ /'di ni yab kyi spyi rgya yin/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las/ /\u0f00 dang mu~M sbyar hU~M dang ni/ /la~M sbyar swa dang pa~M du sbyar/ /\u0f00 dang ma~M sbyar ha~M ta~M bsgreng / /yum gyi spyi rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bcangs/ /\u0f00 bsgreng

rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen khu tshur snying gar bcas/ /la~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/ /rdo rje thal mo

las la 'khril/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /bde gshegs dbyings phyug ma yi rgya/ /rdo rje khu tshur snying gar brtan/ /hU~M bsgreng rtse la rdo rje 'bar/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang

bcas pa ni/ /rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan/ /mu~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/ /rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /rdo rje dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/ /

rdo rje khu tshur snying gar brtan/ /swa bsgreng rtse la rin chen 'bar/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan/ /ma~M bsgreng rtse

la dril gsil 'bar/ /rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /rin chen dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur snying gar brtan/ /a~M bsgreng rtse la pad mo 'bar/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la

brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen khu tshur snying gar brtan/ /pa~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/ /rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /

pad ma dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur snying kar brtan/ /ha~M bsgreng rtse la ral gri 'bar/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen khu tshur snying

gar brtan/ /ta~M bsgreng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/ /rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni/ /las kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur thugs ka na/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /

'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen gar thabs bskor nas su/ /rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa'i tshul/ /gar gyi phyag rgyar dpa' bos bshad/ /rdo rje thugs

kar rin chen 'dzin/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /sa yi snying po'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa na/ /sku yi thad kar 'dzin pa dang / /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa

ni/ /sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje ral gri thugs ka na/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje rin chen rna ltag gzhag /rin chen

phreng ba bzung nas su/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/ /phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags/ /rdo rje pad ma thugs ka na/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi

phyag rgya yin/ rin chen pi bang 'dzin pa la/ /rdo rje len par byas nas ni/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/ /dbyangs kyi phyag rgya yin par grags/ /rdo rje klu shing thugs ka na/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i

mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /byams pa mai tri'i phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen bdug spos thugs kar 'dzin/ /rdo rje las la rab tu 'khril/ /mdzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/ /bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje po Ti thugs kar

'dzin/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /sgrib pa kun sel phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje rin chen rna ltag tu/ /me tog snod bcas 'dzin pa la/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/ /

me tog phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje ud pal thugs ka na/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /'jam dpal gyi ni phyag rgya yin/ /rin chen mar me thugs ka nas/ /rdo rje thal mo las

la 'khril/ /mdzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni/ /mar me'i phyag rgyar dpa' bos bshad/ /rdo rje snye ma thugs ka na/ /rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni/ /kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya yin/ /rin

chen dbyug pa thugs ka na/ /rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril/ /rdo rje nyug par byed pa ni/ /dri yi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /nir mgo gdengs ka gshed po'i rgya/ /rdo rje gnon pa stobs po che/ /thod sbrul gnon pa rta yi rgya/ /rgya

gram gnon pa bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /'dzub gnyis 'khyud pa lcags kyu'i rgya/ /'dzub gnyis rtse sprad zhags pa'i rgya/ /'dzub gnyis 'khyud pa lu gu rgyud/ /bskyod par gyur pa 'bebs ma'o/ /pi bang len pa lha yi rgya/ /

mi yi seg par 'dzin pa ste/ /lha min phyag rgya go cha yin/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor byol song rgya/ /za ma tog ni yi dags rgya/ /me chu gnyis ni dmyal ba'i rgya/ /yab kyi spyi rgya kun bzang gi'o/ /yum gyi spyi rgya bzang mor bshad/ /
yang na kun bzang yab yum gyi/ /rdo rje thal mo gnyis su bshad/ /bder gshegs rnams la rdzogs dkyil lo/ /sems dpa' rnams la sems dpa'i dkyil/ /'joms dang thub pa langs te bcing / /zhes gsungs so/ /

'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po he ru ka rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta bu lags pa bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol/ gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos bshad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/

bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku khro bo chen por 'du

mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten na dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i dbang du 'gro ba rnams gyur te/ khams gsum 'di na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab zer bar ston pa dang / 'jug pa dang / bstan pa la

gnas shing dkon mchog gsum la 'jug pa ni 'ga' yang med/ khros pas gtum po rab tu gdug pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis bsgribs pa gtum zhing 'khrug pa dang / gzhan gyi srog dang sems 'phrog pa

dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyis nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gcos pa dang / gcig shi gcig za ba dang / log pa'i lam la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam la gnas pa'i de

bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chen pos rnam par gzigs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor glog rnam par 'phro ba 'di phyung ngo / /\u0f00 badzra ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+Tan

ta ka hA na da ha pa tsa/ bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la maN Da la/ phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la/ 'di phyung ma thag tu khro bo chen po'i mthus khams gsum 'di dag thams cad g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab

tu 'ur 'ur ro/ shig shig rab tu shig shig / kun du rab tu shig shig /gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/ kun du rab tu gtor gtor ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / srin po la sogs pa rnams

'khrugs pa chen por gyur to/ /de nas 'jigs pas nyen pa de dag brgya byin la skyabs su song / brgya byin yang 'jigs pas nyen te tshangs pa'i thad du phyin/ tshangs pa yang khyab 'jug thad du song / khyab 'jug kyang dbang phyug chen

po'i thad du song / dbang phyug chen po rang gi mthu yod yod pa ston cing lha rnams ma skrag /klu rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin dang / 'khor du gtogs pa rnams ma skrag shig /nga'i mthu 'di la gzhan gang gis kyang brdzi bar

mi nus so zhes spro bsrings so/ /kwa brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug rnams khyed kyang 'jig rten na mthu che ba'i chen po yin pas rang rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ci yod pas rang rang gi 'khor gdug pa de dag dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig

ces bsgo'o/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug rnams de ma thag tu rang rang gi mthu ci yod pa ston cing rdo rje'i skad dang gad mo drag po 'byin cing rang rang gi 'khor rnams la ma skrag ma dngangs shig /bdag cag gi mthu

'di lta bu gzhan gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so zhes spro sring ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas yum rngam pa'i kro d+hi'i rgyal po mngon par phyung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i

gzi mdangs kyi rol pa'i dgyes pas thim par mdzad nas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las phaT phaT badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN Da la ha la ha la zhes pas stong gsum khro bo chol bas gang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid

ni dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad zhabs rnam pa brgyad kyi rnam par snang ngo / /de nas dgyes te hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad las 'dul ba'i dbang gis dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ /khrag gi rgya mtsho

'khrugs pa'i dkyil na keng rus kyi steng na rnam par gnas so/ /khro bo chol pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ji snyed pa kun bsgral te slar 'dus nas/ la la ni las kyi khrag 'thung chen por gyur nas brgya byin 'khor dang bcas

pa bsgral/ la la ni rin chen khrag 'thung du gyur te tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la ni pad ma khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/ ma hA de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la ni las kyi khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/ khyab 'jug

'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ khro bo de dag gis dregs pa can de dag gi nang grol kun drangs/ khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos so/ /de nas dgyes te o~M` ru lu ru lu dza dza zhes brjod pas/ /dbang phyug chen po bcu gnyis dang brgyad

kyi 'khor tshogs ma lus pa yud tsam cig gis dbang du 'dus par gyur pa ni dper na rdo khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i sku la rnam pa brgyad kyis 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas so/ /khrag

thung bzhi la rnam pa lnga lngas 'khril ba'i tshul gyis rnam par gnas pa dang / dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas byang chub sems las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / spos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshogs dang /

rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams 'thon to/ /de nas yang dgyes te he he zhes brjod pas byang chub sems las seng gdong gi tshogs dang / stag gdong gi tshogs dang /

wa gdong gi tshogs dang / khyi gdong gi tshogs dang / bzhad gdong gi tshogs dang / dur bya'i gdong gi tshogs dang / bya rog gdong gi tshogs dang / 'ug pa'i gdong gi tshogs rnams 'thon to/ /de nas yang dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas

byang chub sems las stag gdong gi tshogs dang / phag gdong gi tshogs dang / seng gdong gi tshogs dang / sbrul gdong gi tshogs mthon nas nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rang rang gi gdan ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin

par phaT ces spros so/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams na dregs pa gang ji snyed yod pa thams cad tshul ji ltar 'dul ba dang / thabs cis 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus
btul bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo de dag la dregs pa'i tshogs slar gsol shig zhes bka' stsal bas/ khro bo de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gso bar gsol zhes pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis khro bo de dag gcig tu hU~M zhes pas bsdus te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so/ /de nas ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des phyag bcwa brgyad bsnol te btsir bas mi gtsang ba'i

'dam chen por 'khyil to/ /de nas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba gnam nas rnam par phyung ngo / /oM badzra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri u spri dz+wa/ badzra a mr-i ta hU~M a/ de nas khro mo bdud

rtsi chen mo de smin ma sgyur zhing shin tu rngam pa'i bgad pas ru lu ru lu khA hi khA hi zhes bdud rtsir bsgrubs te gsol bas gdug pa can thams cad snga ma bzhin du rang rang gi lus sos par gyur te sems dran nas dpal chen

ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po'i sku dbu dgu brgya phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgyar gnas shing yab la khro bo brgya rtsa brgyad lhun gyis grub par mthong ngo / /'phra men ma nyi shu'i tshogs kyang shin du rngam pa'i gzugs

rang rang gi stan dang lag char gnas pa mthong nas/ shin du ngo mtshar du gyur nas zhum pa'i nga ros gsol ba btab pa/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /rngam chen rgyal ba'i 'bangs su mchi/ /'bangs su nan
tan ma bgyis na/ /mgo lus snying yang rul nas ni/ /btso bsreg gnas su 'bod sgrogs shog /bdag cag rnams kyi ma dang sring / /mchis brang dang ni bu mo rnams/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhes su gsol/ /

bdag cag rnams kyi mgo bcad la/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes/ /bdag cag rnams kyi snying phyung la/ /dpal chen nyid kyi zhal du gsol/ /bdag cag rnams kyi lpags shus la/ /dpa' bo chen po sku la gsol/ /

a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab ste/ la las ni rang gi lus gdan khrir phul/ /la las ni rang gi mgo bcad nas 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhal bur phul/ la las ni rang gi snying phyung nas zhal du gsol/ la la ni rang gi lpags

pa bshus te sku la g.yang gzhir gsol to/ /dbang phyug chen po rnams dpal chen po'i sku la sbrul ltar 'khril bas des dregs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang ste/ bden pa mthong nas dam tshig dang ldan par

mthong bar gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyang rab tu spro ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma dang ldan te/ la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ma ring du 'phen/ /la la ni ri rab klad la skor/ la la ni nyi zla

zhabs 'og gnon/ /la la ni 'jig rten rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma ston cing a la la zhes pa'i sgra rnam par 'byin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'jigs

byed tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen du/ /rag ta'i rba rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil/ /keng rus ri rab 'bar ba'i steng / /me 'bar sreg pa'i klong

dkyil na/ /dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /tshad dang rgya yongs ma chad pa/ /phyi nang med par gsal ba'i 'od/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs bzhi pa/ /gru chad bar khyams bzhis brgyan pa/ /gru bzhi sgo khyud 'bar

bas mdzes/ /bar khyams gnyis ni 'bar bar gsal/ /nyi zla sbrul dang thod pas brgyan/ /khyu mchog dang ni ma he gzig /stag dang gtum thung dom dag gis/ /sder mos dregs pa brgya byin dang / /tshangs pa dbang phyug bzung

ba ni/ /gdan chen rnams kyang bzung ba'o/ /dbus su 'jigs byed chen po ni/ /smug nag chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de/ /spyan 'bar ba ni nyi shu bdun/ /zhabs brgyad mthur du gtams pa'o/ /

rtsub pa'i phyag mtshan skal bar thogs/ /rdo rje gshog pa phyogs bcur gtams/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis rab tu bzhugs/ /btsun mo rngam pa kro d+hi yang / /cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po ltar/ /de yi phyogs kyi khro bo yang / /

khrag 'thung rdo rje rin chen dang / /pad ma las kyi he ru ka /kun kyang dbu gsum phyag drug ste/ /zhabs bzhi dag tu rnam par bgrad/ /kro d+hi'i tshogs kyis rab tu 'khril/ /'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mtshan la/ /dkar mo la sogs

ral pa can/ /rang stan lag char chas te gnas/ /phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas/ /seng gdong la sogs mgo brnyan tshogs/ /stan dang lag cha de bzhin chas/ /sgo grungs gdong mo la sogs gnas/ /rang gi lag mtshan stan dang

chas/ /'bar ba'i bar 'khyams gnyis pa la/ /rdo rje srin po khro bo bcu/ /hU~M chen rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can/ /gshed po mi g.yo rta mgrin rgyal/ /gzhan gyis mi thub bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal stobs po che/ /de dag

rnams dang gnyis med pa'i/ /rdo rje srin mo khro mo bcu/ /rlung 'byin snyems mo sder mo dang / /dur khrod gtun khung gtum mo dang / /mda' snyems sgra 'byin gsod ma dang / /skul byed rnams kyis rab tu 'khril/ /kun kyang zhal gsum

phyag drug ste/ /zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ /'jig rten skyong bas btung tshul lo/ /de dag rnams kyi bka' sdod ni/ /rdo rje 'phra men gtum bag can/ /mche bshog 'bar ba'i tshogs dang 'khor/ /slas dang byi mo bran

mo dang / /ci bgyi la sogs pho nya'i tshogs/ /phyi rol mu ran dag la gnas/ /zhes gsungs pas snang srid thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen pos gsung gi dkyil 'khor

'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /\u0f00 b+h+rU~M bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra b+h+rU~M/ \u0f00 \u0f00 \u0f00 \u0f00/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ ma ma ma ma ma/ hA hA hA hA hA/ bud+d+ha/ badzra rat+na/ pad+ma karma/ shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/ he he he he he/

ru ru ru ru ru/ ka ka ka ka ka /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ \u0f00 \u0f00 \u0f00 \u0f00 / ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ bud+d+ha badzra rat+na/ pad+ma/ karma/ kro kro kro kro kro/ d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI/ shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/ ri ri ri ri ri/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/

dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ gau rI/ tsau rI/ pra mo hA/ bait+ta lI/ puk+ka sI/ g+hasma rI/ sma shA nI/ tsaN+Da lI/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sid+ha/ byA g+h+r-i/ sr-i gla/ shwa na/ kr-i D+ha/ kAng+ka ka kha ga / a+'u lu/ mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/

kha kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ he he he he he he he he/ ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra/ Ar+yA te dza te dzaHa mu kha/ lo ka b+ha smi pa lA ya/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha

hU~M kA ra bi dza ya/ nI la daN+Da ya mAn+ta ka /Ar+ya a tsa la/ ha ya grI wa/ a pa rA dzi ta/ a mr-i ta kuN+da li/ tri lo ka bi dza ya/ ma hA bA la/ hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M`/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro/

d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI/ ba ya be sha~M bar+t+ti le no ki/ tra ta hri sta na pa ta/ mu ha la/ tsaN+Da lI ya ti/ sha ya ba ti/ ba ya be mA ra Na/ tsun+d+ho/ hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M`/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT

phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ru lu/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ zhes gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor

du gyur pa'o/ /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rngam pa'i rgyal po des stang stabs kyi rnam

par rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stang stabs 'di dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /chos kun mnyam pa'i ngang rtogs na/ /bsgul zhing bsigs pa thams cad kun/ /

phyag rgya yin par dpa' bos bshad/ /rang gi lha yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /stang stabs 'di la gang gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang skrag 'gyur na/ /dregs pa'i tshogs lta smos ci dgos/ /lag gnyis thal sbyar spyi gtsug bzhag /

rkang gnyis mthil sprad rtse mo btsugs/ /mgo mtshan rdo rje snying por bsgom/ /rtse gcig rtse gsum rtse lnga dang / /rtse dgu bcu gcig rdo rje bsgom/ /sa steng kun tu mchong byas pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ /de nyid g.yon gyi phyogs

nas mchong / /'jigs byed ma yi phyag rgya bshad/ /lag g.yas gung mo snying por bya/ /gung mdzub srin lag rtse gsum tshul/ /mthe bos mthe 'u chung bsnan par bya/ /lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje'i tshul/ /g.yon pa ban d+ha ltar byas nas/ /

dkrugs nas zhal du gsol ba ni/ /rdo rje khrag 'thung phyag rgya yin/ /g.yas pa gtso la 'khyud tshul du/ /g.yon pa rak+ta stob pa ni/ /rdo rje kro d+hi kun gyi rgya/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /g.yon pa dung dmar rag ta 'thung / /'di

ni rin chen khrag 'thung rgya/ /de nyid gung 'dzub srin lag gzhibs/ /ral gri 'degs pa ltar byas pa/ /pad ma khrag 'thung phyag rgya yin/ /de nyid g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs/ /mthe bo gung mdzub mthe'u chung rnams/ /so sor

brkyang ba rgya gram tshul/ /las kyi khrag 'thung phyag brgyar bshad/ /khrag 'thung g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul/ /kro d+hi g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum tshul/ /stabs su mchong bar dpa' bos bshad/ /g.yas pa'i khu tshur

bcangs nas bsgreng / /g.yon pa 'dzin pa ltar byas pa/ /g.yas dang g.yon du lta zhing sgyur/ /go'u ri tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'i tshul du ni/ /'bri tshugs mi 'gyur lta byed pa/ /rkun mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya

yin/ /g.yas pas khu tshur bcangs pa ni/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung brkyang bar byas/ /g.yon pas 'dzin pa'i khro tshul lta/ /pra mo'i phyag rgya dpa' bos bshad/ /g.yas pa'i gung mo rtse mo brkyang / /sor bzhi rtse bsdus rdo rje 'phyar/ /

g.yon pad dku ru brten pa ni/ /'bri tshugs lte ba be ta'i rgya/ /g.yon pas nyon mongs mnan tshul la/ /g.yas pas rgyu 'dren za ba'i tshul/ /pu ka'i phyag brgyar bshad pa yin/ /g.yon pa dung khrag 'dzin pa la/ /g.yas pas 'khrug

cing rngam tshul ston/ /g+hasma ri yi phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pas byis pa'i lus mnan nas/ /g.yas pas snying 'dren za tshul du/ /sgrol tshul lta ba sma sha'i rgya/ /g.yas pas mgo bcad phyir nas kyang / /g.yon pas lus 'dzin stobs pa ltar/ /

tsaN Da li yi phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis brang la bsnol nas ni/ /kho na ro thogs ral gsigs pa/ /seng gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis mthur du bsnol nas ni/ /zhing la 'bri tshugs mche ba bsnyer/ /stag gdong

tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis zhing khong kha phye nas/ /lce yis ldag pa ltar byed na/ /wa gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis zhing khong kha phye nas/ /'bri tshugs lta ba shwa na'i rgya/ /lag gnyis spu gri thogs tshul du/ /

g.yon pas rgyu ma gzang zhing za/ /gzhad gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /zhing chen phrag la bkal nas ni/ /keng rus thogs pa ltar byas pa/ /dur bya'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa ban d+ha g.yas pa gri/ /glo snying 'dren

pa ltar byed pa/ /khwa khwa ma yi phyag rgya yin/ /g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur la/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa hu lu'i rgya/ /'dzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas/ /rta skad mtsher ba ltar byas la/ /rta gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /'dzub gnyis

rtse sbyar phag gdong gis/ /tha rgod rlog pa'i tshul bstan pa/ /phag gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /'dzub gnyis lu gu rgyud du 'khyud/ /seng ge'i tshul du ral gsigs pa/ /seng gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis

rab tu bskyod bya zhing / /phyogs bcur lta bar byed pa ni/ /sbrul gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bcings byas shing / /rkang pa 'jog tshul stabs su mchod/ /g.yas pa'i sdigs 'dzub nam mkhar 'phyar/ /

g.yon pa dku ru brten pa ni/ /hU~M ka ra yi phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa sder mor gdengs/ /g.yon pa 'dzin pa rnam rgyal rgya/ /g.yas kyi sor mo dbyug par brkyang / /g.yon pa gar thabs skor bar byed/ /dbyug sngon

can gyi phyag rgya yin/ /g.yas pa'i khu tshur nam mkhar 'phyar/ /g.yon pas gru mo brten pa ni/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yas pa'i gung 'dzub srin lag brkyang / /mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan par bya/ /

g.yon pa 'ang de bzhin shugs su bya/ /mi g.yo ral gri'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud/ /lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /dpral ba'i thad kar bzung ba ni/ /rta mchog dpal gyi phyag rgya yin/ /

lag gnyis khu tshur mdun du bcangs/ /zhags pa'i tshul du drangs pa ni/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis khu tshur gyen du bsnol/ /dril bu bsil tshul bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur 'phyar/ /

rdeg pa'i stabs su byas pa ni/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis khu tshur mthur du brkyang / /gnon pa'i stabs su bgrad pa ni/ /stobs po che yi phyag rgya yin/ /gyad kyi dor stabs tshul du gnas/ /

stobs su mchong ba khro bo'i rgya/ /srin mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rkang lag gar thabs bskor ba yin/ /yang na khro bo'i phyag rgya las/ /g.yas g.yon bzlog pa yin par gsungs/ /ci bgyid bka' nyan phyag rgya ni/ /

g.yas g.yon sor mo drag sprugs pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des bsnyen bsgrub rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /zhugs nas kyang bsnyen bsgrub zab mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bsam yas kyang / /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i don gyi phyir/ /mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhir bshad do/ /thog mar bsnyen pa yin par bshad/ /gnyis

pa dag ni nye bsnyen pa/ /gsum pa bsgrub pa zhes su brjod/ /tha ma bsgrub chen po zhes bya/ /bye brag tu ni shes byas la/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /bsnyen bsgrub bye brag shes bya zhing / /de la gnas pa rab tu
gces/ /de dag mi shes mi gnas pas/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /las rnams brtsams kyang don med 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor bas/ /byang chub

sems ni shes par bya/ /nye bar bsnyen pa la gnas pas/ /bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /de yang gsang sngags bdag po nyid/ /rig ma bskyed dang bskul bya ba/ /bsgrub pa zhes su rgyal bas gsungs/ /

thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gsungs/ /gang yin rdo rje 'grub 'gyur ba/ /bsgrub pa chen po zhes su bya/ /byang chub sems zhes bya ba yang / /dam pa'i don gyi sems yin te/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos

med pas/ /rang gi sems kyis shes bya ba/ /bsnyen pa'i dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ni/ /sngags kyi bdag po'i cha lugs su/ /ting 'dzin nan tan khugs par bsgom/ /thams cad lha yi rang bzhin pas/ /

bdag nyid lha yi mtshan nyid de/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang rnam ldan par/ /shes pa nye bsnyen dam tshig yin/ /rig ma bskyed dang bskul bya ba'i/ /rten du bya ba shes rab ma/ /mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i gzungs/ /b+ha ga

gsang ba'i pad mo ni/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi pho brang ste/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba'i gnas/ /slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul/ /da ltar sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rten/ /rnal 'byor ngo la de ltar snang / /ma rtogs pa

la 'khor ba'i lam/ /sgrub pa rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i rten/ /rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya/ /chen po lngas bsdus thams cad kun/ /de nas yum du gnas mod kyi/ /mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bsgrub phyir

rigs kyi dbye ba bya/ /smyin ma'i dkyus ring lag sor phra/ /tshigs pa zlum la rked skabs phyed/ /phra bshad ud pal ngad ldang zhing / /so dkar skra 'jam mthon 'thing 'khril/ /mig kyang zar ma'i me tog 'dra/ /skra mtshams

'khyug la mdog kyang gsal/ /sna bzang skye ring sems ma 'dra/ /lus drang nu ma'i dkyil na mtho/ /khong dal 'gro na 'jab pa 'dra/ /skad ni ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dra/ /cir yang mdzes pa'i stobs ldan pa/ /spyi yi rigs dang

mtshan du bshad/ /bzhin dbyibs sogs ka mdog kyang dmar/ /mig rings so thags rab tu dam/ /so la shel chags kos ko phra/ /lus la zhim pa'i dri 'byung ba/ /pad ma can zhes bya bar bshad/ /zla ba'i mdangs ltar

dkar la gsal/ /gtsug phud g.yas 'khril skad kyang che/ /bong chung lus mdzes tshig tu snyan/ /dung ltar lus bzhin g.yas su 'khril/ /dung can ma zhes bya bar grags/ /'dod pa che la brtul zhugs che/ /shes pa

gsal la byad bzhin yangs/ /bu mo mig mangs ma ru bshad/ /sbas pa'i brda dang thabs la mkhas/ /phyi nang rlung khar gser ltar lci/ /bsdig cing kun gyis drod mi lon/ /don la gzhol la rtog pa med/ /zla gsang

dkar dmar rlung khar lci/ /rigs dang mtshan du bshad pa yin/ /skra ni mthon mthing lcang lor bshad/ /srid du ring la phra la ldem/ /lcug phran mang po 'dab rgyas pa/ /ljon pa ma zhes bshad pa yin/ /phra zhing bshan

la bzangs ring ba/ /bcu gnyis nyi shu lnga yi bar/ /mu la rag ta 'dzag pa la/ /rdo rje mtshon gyis ma phog pa/ /lcug phran ma yi rigs su bshad/ /sor mo gru bzhi skra yang kham/ /smin tshogs che zhing mig kyang 'bur/ /

'gram glad ring la skra mtshams dma'/ /sha mdog che zhing rna ba ring / /ba lang can zhes bya bar bshad/ /bzhin mdog gru gsum kha dog gnag /skra rtsub shel la khro gnyer mang / /ri mo can zhes bya bar bshad/ /skye

rgyud med cing bkra mi shis/ /gcig pur 'dug pa gdong gcig ma'o/ /yan lag thams cad mes tshig bzhin/ /gtan du 'phel ba'i rgyu med pa/ /me reg ma yi rigs su bshad/ /gzhan yang lha 'am lha min nam/ /gnod

sbyin srin po la sogs pa/ /mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams na/ /mo yi rigs can gang yang rung / yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa'i brten yin te/ /thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya'o/ /de dag

gang rnyed byin gyis brlab/ /de yi spyi bo gtsug tu ni/ /zla dkyil ma~M las kun bzang mo/ /snying gar zla dkyil la~M bsams te/ /yangs pa'i spyan du bsgom par bya/ /lce stengs zla dkyil yi ge pa~M/ /gos dkar ma yi lte ba la/ /zla

dkyil maM las mA ma kI/ /yan lag bzhi yi dkyil 'khor la/ /ta~M las sgrol ma'i phyag rgyar gsal/ /lag g.yas lcags kyu'i sku ru bsgom/ /lag g.yon dril bu lcags sgrog kha/ /zhags pa pad ma dag la'o/ /rdo rje thabs

la yab rnams bsgom/ /de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang / /b+ha ga'i dbyibs su me ri bsgom/ /byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs bya'o/ /

mtshan ldan shes rab de nyid la/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan du gdags/ /gser gyi rna cha gdu bu dang / /do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /'jam zhing gsal bar byas pa yis/ /chos gos lnga dang ldan par bya/ /a ga ru dang

du ru ska/ /dris spos tsan dan sbyar ba yin/ /khrus kyi cho ga dag par bya/ /dri zhim byug pas lus la byug /rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas/ /nang yang dag pa'i khrus bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems bskyed de/ /mi dmigs

don la sems sbyar phyir/ /skye med byang chub sems kyi don/ /rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya/ /snang srid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/ /lhun gyis grub par yid ches bya/ /de nas bskul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i

brda yis bsre bar bya/ /sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M zhes pas bsre/ /ra ga ya mi zhes brjod na/ /ra ho ha~M zhes kyang ni bya/ /ti pa su ke zhes brjod na/ /gan de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon/ /a ti pu ho zhes brjod na/ /

pra ti pu ho zhes pas mtshon/ /g.yas pa smyin ma bskyod na ni/ /g.yon pa'i smyin mas de bzhin mtshon/ /de bzhin brda sna tshogs pas bsre/ /de nas bskul bar bya ba ni/ /shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /thams mchog

zla ba'i 'od zer la/ /bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do/ /mi g.yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongs su gsol/ /rnam par rtog bral shin tu dri med sku/ /'od zer zla rgyas 'dra ba'i mdangs ldan zhal/ /dgyes pa'i rol ba'i don

la gshegs su gsol/ /thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer la/ /bskul ba'i cho ga 'di skad do/ /'byor ldan yid 'ong rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings/ /shes rab zab mo rnam dag pad ma'i

mdangs/ /rdzu 'phrul thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma/ /'byor ldan yid 'ong cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston/ /ho/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba/ /e ma'o pad ma 'bar ba'i ze'u 'bru 'di/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs
kyis 'bul lags na/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas/ /byang chub sems sprin dbab tu gsol/ /zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bskul ba/ /e ma'o/ /'od zer dga' te yid 'ong ma/ /sems 'phreng gdungs pa'i shes rab
gzungs/ /ga'u 'khril ba'i pad ma la/ /rdo rje bde ba'i byang chub 'bar/ /a la la ho/ /de nas gnyis med bde mchog sems/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyi tshogs chen la/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pa 'bul/ /

grub pa nyi zla'i snying po de/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje chen pos blang / /'gro drug sems can bag chags sreg /zhi ba'i mtha' la shi ba bslang / /phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thugs dam bskul/ /de ltar bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /bsgrub

pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs/ /de dag dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu/ /rig pa'i dam tshig bsgoms pa'i lam/ /sngags kyi bdag po bdag 'grub ste/ /gang yin las la 'jug nus pa'i/ /dam tshig grub pa chen po yin/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag

po des 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid las dngos grub kyi bye brag 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las

phyung ngo / /de la 'di ni phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la bsgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rang sems shin tu sbyangs pas na/ /phra mo'i dngos grub bsgrub pa gces/ /

rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /bdag nyid nam mkha'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o/ /rang gi lhar ni rang bsgoms nas/ /phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam/ /rin chen rgyu las grub pa yi/ /bsnyan

ma'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du/ /so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru rnams/ /che chung yungs dkar 'bru tshod tsam/ /snying ga'i dkyil du gsal ba las/ /hU~M gis khong du drangs nas ni/ /khong nas kha ru byung bar bsam/ /

hU~M gi dbugs la zhon nas su/ /sna yi rtse mor byung ba dang / /sna rtse nyid du gsal bar bsgom/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar khugs pa dang / /sna yi rtse nas nam mkha' la/ /je ring je ring phaT kyis spro/ /ring du spro ba goms

pa dang / /'od dang bcas pa'i yig 'bru des/ /phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsung gi yi ge ji snyed pa/ /dbyar gyi sprin phung 'dus pa bzhin/ /hU~M gis snying ka nyid du bsdu/ /yungs dkar 'bru tshod de nyid

la/ /stong gsum 'jig rten kun bcug kyang / /de yi nang du sa le gsal/ /sngags kyis brtags pa'i lha rnams kyi/ /gnas su 'ang de nyid gsal bar bsgom/ /de lta'i 'phro 'du yang dang yang / /goms par ci nus dag tu bya/ /

de ni gsung gi phra mor bshad/ /so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru las/ /phyag mtshan yungs dkar tsam du gsal/ /snying ka nyid du gsal ba nas/ /rgyal ba'i pho brang 'dus kyi bar/ /gong ma'i go rims de yis bya/ /de ni thugs

kyi phra mor bshad/ /so so'i thugs mtshan gsal ba las/ /rang rang lha yi rnam par gsal/ /thugs kar yungs kar 'bru tshod tsam/ /gong ma'i tshul du bya bar bshad/ /de ni sku yi phra mo yin/ /de ltar lha tshogs ma lus par/ /
rims kyis yang na cig char ro/ /cig char bsgom pa shin tu dka'/ /bde gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul min/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rims kyis ni/ /gtso nas 'khor gyi bar
dag tu/ /yang nas yang du gsal bar bsgom/ /'di dag bsgoms pa'i yon tan ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par nges/ /thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor kun/ /

'di las 'byung bar gdon mi za/ /'di thos dngos grub gzhan rnams kun/ /bsgrub mi dgos par grub pa yin/ /rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom byas na/ /zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub/ /zas su bshang ci za ba 'am/ /

sha rnams zos na 'grub pa yin zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dgon pa'i gnas sam ri bo dben/ /me tog 'bras bu rgyas pa ru/ /rang gi lus ngag sems rdo rje'i/ /snying gar zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /'jam dpal sa bon mu~M du bsgom/ /bdag lus dang ni zla ba dang / /mu~M rnams rim par je zhi la/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa las/ /snying rje mu~M dang zla ba las/ /rdo rje 'jam pa'i phyag rgya bsgom/ /lus dang

ngag sems rdo rje las/ /rdo rje 'jam pa rab 'phros pas/ /'jam dpal nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du/ /rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od dang bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs brgyan pa'i/ /

'jam dpal nyid du kun gyis mthong / /mngon shes ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /lus kyi rnam pa mthong mi 'gyur/ /de nas slar ni bsdus pa las/ /thugs ka'i mu~M la thim bsams na/ /mchog tu shes rab rno ba dang / /mkhyen
rab kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang thob 'gyur na/ /'jig rten shes bya smos ci dgos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
dbus dag tu/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas su/ /rang nyid gang 'dod lhar bsgom te/ /sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs pa'i/ /dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la/ /sran ma tsam gyi ri lu bya/ lcags gsum
ga 'ur bcug nas ni/ /khar bcug rang gi snying po las/ /rab tu goms par 'di byas na/ /gang 'dod rigs 'dzin gdon mi za/ /mtha' yas zhing khams thams cad kyi/ /rdul snyed bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas

kun/ /de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog ces gsungs so/ /yang na rang gi phyag rgya ste/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /bdag nyid gang

'dod ltar bsgoms te/ /rang gi phyag rgya brnyan mar bya/ /lag tu thogs la rang rigs sngags/ /bzlas na rigs 'dzin gang yin 'gyur/ /rang gi lha ni gang yin pa'i/ /yon tan dag ni de thob 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /

de la 'di ni rdo rje lha dang / lha mo dgug pa'i cho ga'o/ /shing gcig drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am/ /mtshan ma gcig dang zhi gnas su/ /bdag nyid gtso gzung ldan byas nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid bsam/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /lag na kyo ba thogs pa yi/ /sprul pa bsam yas 'phro bar bya// dza yA ra Na phaT/ gang dgug lha 'am bud med dam/ /ya~M las rlung gis bteg bsams te/ /kyo bas gdan nam snying ka nas/ /gzung

ste hU~M gis bsdus byas na/ /sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang / /rang dbang med par khugs 'gyur na/ /'jig rten bu mo smos ci dgos/ /gang 'dod las de byed bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de ni 'di ni rdo rje sgrub

pa'i thabs so/ /bdag nyid sngags kyi skyes bu yi/ /rdo rje'i skur ni rab bsgoms te/ /lce la pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas \u0f00 du bsam/ /de las rdo rje gsung du gyur/ /bsam yas a~M gi 'phro 'du las/ /

sangs rgyas gsung dang sems can dag /bdag gi lce la 'dus pa ru/ /yang nas yang du goms par bsdu/ /'jig rten tshig gam chos kyi sgra/ /ngag brjod bden zhing nyan pa dang / /brdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub sogs/ /ngag gis

nyes pa ci brjod kyang / /lce sgrib spangs par gdon mi za zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni sha rnam pa lnga'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /bdag nyid lus ngag sems rdo rje/ /rdo rje gsum du rnam par bsgom/ /mtshan dang

dpe byad yang dag ldan/ /ye shes dam tshig snying kar bsgom/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje gsal bar bya/ /sha chen dag ni thams cad la/ /sa bon \u0f00 gyis rnam par sbyang / /srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /sha chen ji snyed

yod pa kun/ /\u0f00 gyis 'phro 'dus bsdus nas ni/ /spyod tshe bdag la thim par bsgom/ /glang po dag gi sha rnams la/ /hU~M lce'i dam tshig rdo rje la/ /rdo rje can gyis hU~M du bsgom/ /ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /zos na dam

tshig sku gsung thugs/ /rdo rje thob par gdon mi za/ /phyag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs 'grub/ /cho ga go rims de yis ni/ /glang po dag gi sha rnams la/ /hU~M gi 'phro 'dus rab sbyangs te/ /zos na mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur/ /rta sha

dag ni thams cad la/ /swa yi 'phro 'dus rab sbyangs te/ /zos na mi snang kun gyi mchog /khyi sha dag ni thams cad la/ /ha yi 'phro 'dus rab sbyangs na/ /dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma kun/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur/ /gnyid

kyi dgra yang mod la 'joms/ /ba glang sha ni thams cad la/ /a~M gyi 'phro 'dus sbyang byas te/ /cho ga bzhin du zos na ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi longs spyod 'phrog / /mthu chen kun gyis bu mo yang / /spyod par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /

zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /bdag nyid rnam pa kun ldan pa'i/ /sngags kyi lus su rnam sbyangs nas/ /mig gi dbang po thams

cad la/ /yig 'bru lnga yis rab sbyangs te/ /'od zer lngar ni 'phro ba las/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/ /mig gi mngon shes kun bsdus nas/ /dbang po de la thim pa dang / /zos sam mig la rtag bskus

na/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/ /spyod yul ji snyed yod pa kun/ /shing thog lag tu gzhag pa bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis gsal bar mthong / /cho ga gong ma'i tshul gyis ni/ /rna ba'i dbang po thams cad la/ /

sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/ /rna ba'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas/ /zos sam rna ba'i nang bzhag na/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/ /sgra rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /rna ba'i drung du 'dod pa bzhin/ /
snying gi bye brag thams cad la/ /sangs rgyas sems can/ thams cad kyi/ /dran pa'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas/ /zos sam snying kar bzhag na ni/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/ /thugs dang sems kyi

rgyud dag ni/ /mkhyen cing rig pa kun shes 'gyur/ /yum gyi mkha' las byung ba yi/ /rag ta dag ni thams cad la/ /sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/ /gnas rnams ma lus kun bsdus nas/ /zos sam snying kar gzhag

na ni/ /sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams/ /zhag gsum lon bzhin gsal bar 'gyur/ /snying kar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ /phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /bkug nas de dag rdzu 'phrul rnams/ /phrogs

nas snying kar bsdu byas na/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje rdzu 'phrul thams cad kun/ /'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje bsrung ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sku gsung thugs ni rnam bsgoms

la/ /snying kar nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor las/ /khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba yis/ /bsrung bar bya ba'i zug rngu rnams/ /phyung ste med par bsams nas ni/ /lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya dag ni thams cad dam/ /yang na rdo rje rgya

gram 'am/ /rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis/ /lus dang ngag sems rab bsrungs na/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi tshugs na/ /phal pa rnams kyis smos ci dgos zhes gsungs so/ /las 'di sbyar bar bya ba yang / /ljongs sam grong khyer

grong dag tu/ /sngags kyi bdag po rab gnas la/ /nad kun spong ba'i las 'di bya/ /rdo rje rtse lnga 'od 'phro ba/ /bskal ba'i me bzhin bsams nas su/ /spros pas nad rnams bsregs nas ni/ /slar yang rdo rje nyid la bsdu/ /de nas rdo rje

de nyid las/ /'od zer ser po spros pa yis/ /nad rnams gtong ba'i gnas de dag /bskal pa yun du gang bsams te/ /goms par yang dang yang bsams na/ /nad rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /de na 'khod pa'i skye bo

rnams/ /sprul pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob/ /tshe ring lang 'tsho bde bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni zhi ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' bar/ /

rnam par snang mdzad bsgom pa ni/ /nam mkha'i dbus su zla ba la/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po bsams nas su/ /rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /snying kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bud d+ha lo tsa'i snying po bsam/ /de las lha

mo'i skur spros pas/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsgom/ /slar 'dus 'od kyi thig ler gsal/ /de nyid bdag gi lus la dbab/ /bdag gi sba spu'i bu ga nas/ /sangs rgyas sprin chen rab 'phros te/ /'dod pa'i lus nang gang

bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis de lus la/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu stsol/ /de yis skad cig de yi tshe/ /drag po gtum po 'ang lhan ner 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rgyas pa'i bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha'i dbus su

zla ba la/ /chos kyi sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ /snying kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gos dkar can gyi snying po bsam/ /de las gos dkar nyid 'phros pas/ /mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsgom/ /de las 'od kyi gong

bu ni/ /gru bzhi lam par gsal bar bsdu/ /ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas/ /rin chen sprin chen rab spros pas/ /rdo rje chos su sgoms nas su/ /'dod par bya ba'i lus nang dgang / /yang nas yang du 'di byas na/ /bar snang ci 'dod

rgyas par 'gengs/ /nor bu rin chen bzhin 'drar 'gyur/ /dgos pa phra mo smos ci dgos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje dbang du bsdu ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor zla gam ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su

bsam/ /rdo rje chos mchog gzugs su bsam/ /snying kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /nyid kyi snying po bsam par bya/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /mkha' dbyings thams cad gang bar bsgom/ /'od zer sna lnga 'phros

pa yis/ /'dod pa la ni dbab par bya/ /de nas bsdus te bdag nyid kyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byin bsdus na/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang dbang 'du na/ /'gro ba dbang med smos ci dgos zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje

drag po bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /khros pa'i gzugs rnams bsgoms bya ste/ /bskal ba'i me dpung 'phros pa las/ /khros pa'i rdo rje srin po dang / /

sna tshogs wa dang bya rog dang / /bya rgod khyi la sogs pa yi/ /'phra men bsam yas mi bzad pas/ /mkha' dbyings gang bar bsgoms nas su/ /sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed na/ /dngos sam yang na bsams nas kyang / /

mtshon cha thogs pa de dag gis/ /snying dang nang grol dbang po kun/ /drangs te zos par rab bsgoms na/ /dgra rnams 'chi bar nges pa ste/ /de ltar rab tu bsgoms na ni/ /rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa yang / /zla ba phyed kyis 'chi

'gyur na/ /dam tshig nyams pa smos ci dgos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni skye 'gro 'dul ba'i phur bu bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sdig pa byed dam gnod byed pa/ /rdo rje phur bus gdul bar bya/ /dur khrod gnas sam

rkang gcig tu/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'am ki li ma/ /gang yang rung bar gnas byas la/ /rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom/ /me stag 'phro ba'i 'od 'phro bas/ /ri rab gling bzhi'i gzugs byas la/ /rang gi sngags kyis gdab

par bya/ /de ltar rab tu gdab byas na/ /'gro dang mi 'gro thams cad kun/ /dul bar gyur pa gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni gzhan gyi rig sngags gnon pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha' dbyings

kyi dbus su ni/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni/ /las kyi sems dpar bdag gnas la/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga bzhag / rig sngags byed pa bsams nas ni/ /las kyi rdo rje'i rkang pa dag /de yi spyi nas mnan
par bsgom/ /rig sngags nyid kyang mnan par bsam/ /des ni mu stegs can dag dang / /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kun/ /mnan par 'gyur te the tshom med ces gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni gzhan gyi dpung mnan pa

bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che/ /pad ma dmar ser mdog 'dra ba/ /shin du che zhing brjid par bsgom/ /pha rol dmag dpung

'og dag tu/ /rlung dang mtsho dang sa skyed pa/ /de la gnas pa'i dpung rnams kyis/ /steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de steng rdo rje rgya gram gyi/ /steng du ri rab rnam par bsgom/ /de yi steng du mnan bsam na/ /sangs rgyas dpung
yang gnon par nus/ /mi rgyal dpung la smos ci dgos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dgra'i dpung rmongs par bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /dgra 'am dpung gi gzugs brnyan dag /bsams sam gzugs su byas nas

ni/ /rdo rje phur bu tshad ldan la/ /hU~M las khro bo'i skur bskyed nas/ /rang gi rig sngags rab zlas te/ /snying gar btab par rab bsgoms nas/ /khros pas byas na sangs rgyas kyi/ /dpung yang myos par gdon mi za zhes

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chu la 'bying ba med pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /sngags kyi bdag po rab tu bsgom/ /chu yi steng ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas dag gis gtams par bsgom/ /

steng nas dal gyis bcag par bsam/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyi/ /spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom/ /de ltar rab tu goms pa dang / /sa la 'gro bzhin nus par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni thogs

med rlung gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkhar rdo rje dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /'og gi phyogs su ya~M las ni/ /rlung gis rab tu bteg par

bsgom/ /de ltar rab tu bsgom byas na/ /mkha' la bya bzhin 'gro bar nus/ /zhing khams kun du bgrod par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nyi ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sku gsung

thugs ni rdo rje yi/ /snying kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /de las 'od du 'phros pa las/ /mun pa'i gnas rnams gsal bar nges/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rlung bcad pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /bdag nyid

rlung gi phyogs song la/ /stegs bu gru bzhi lham par bya/ /spos kyi thig le bdun byas te/ /ya~M las rlung bdun bskyed par bya/ /rlung lha dgug par byas nas su/ /kham phor gyis ni dgab byas te/ /de steng la~M las ri rab bsgom/ /

ri rab rtse la khro bo ni/ /'bar ba dag gis mnan par bsgom/ /des ni 'jig pa'i rlung rnams kyang / /bcings par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni char dbab pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi

dbus su ni/ /pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom/ /dbus su khro bo stobs po che/ /'dab ma la ni klu brgyad po/ /bsgoms sam yang na bris kyang rung / /khro bo'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni/ /klu rnams rab tu mnan nas su/ /hU~M

gnyis bar tu klu rnams kyi/ /snying po spel cing gzir nas su/ /klu rnams gnas pa'i sa phyogs su/ /hU~M zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya/ /khro bos mnan pas klu rnams kyi/ kha nas char pa skyugs bsams na/ /'jig

dus lta bu'i char pa'ang 'bab/ /ces gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni char ba dang ser ba gcad pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rta mchog dpal ni rnam par bsam/ /nyi ma'i

mdog 'dra 'od bzangs zhal/ /nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs/ /lce yi steng du hU~M bzhag ste/ /mi ri 'od dang bcas pa yis/ /char chus gang ba'i sprin rnams kun/ /bskam zhing lce yis blangs bsams na/ /skam par

'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /yang na lce stengs de nyid du/ /ya~M las rlung du bsgoms nas ni/ /bus pas sprin rnams gtor bar 'gyur/ /yang na ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /char sprin dang ni klu yi gzugs/ /bcad cing dum bur gtubs

bsams te/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sdig 'dzub kyis/ /bsdus te rang rig sngags bzlas na/ /'jig pa'i char che de rnams kyang / /skad cig na ni med par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni bgegs bsal ba'i thabs so/ /

nam mkha'i dbus su nyi ma yi/ /dbus su khro bo rnam bsgom pa/ /mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag rgya che/ /rig pa mang pos bskor ba'o/ /rang rig sngags dang stangs tshul gyis/ /hU~M dang phaT ces rnam bsgrags na/ /khams gsum dregs pa

thams cad kyang / /rdul phran bzhin du rlag par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chom rkun bcing ba'i thabs so/ /rkang rjes sa dang khyi khrag las/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu la/ /'od zer

can gyi sngags bzlas pas/ /lan grangs nyi shur bsngags nas ni/ /mig gnyis su ni gdab par bya/ /gzugs brnyan tshogs la phul nas ni/ /rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung / /o~M` sum b+ha badzra mu sa le na tsur+NA ya na ra

big+h+nan hU~M phaT/ las 'di brtsam pa byas na ni/ /mi rgod bzlog par gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni me bsad pa'i thabs so/ /me ni mched pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkha' lding rgyal po bya khyung ni/ /stang zil lta bu'i

kha dog la/ /sbrul nag stong gis rab brgyan pa'i/ /gshog pa mkha' la gdengs pa bsgom/ /klu rnams la ni sprin dag la/ /rdo rje tshig tu bsgo ba ni/ /char chen phob la me sod ces/ /thos nas sprin tshogs bum pa yi/ /char gyis me

yang gsod par 'gyur/ /gshog pas me nyid bkab nas su/ /mchus brkos chus ni mtshams bcad na/ /bskal ba'i mes kyang 'tshig mi nus/ /\u0f00 badzra na ra ya Na/ nirba ba ya ti na ba~M bu me g+he hU~M zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni thog

bzlog pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/ /zhal gsum phyag bzhir rnam par gnas/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /snyems ma dang ni byams ma dang / /chu srin rgyal mtshan zhes

bya ba/ /me tog rol ba zhes bya yi/ /lha mo bzhi yis rnam par bskor/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor/ /g.yon pa'i dril bu dkur brten pa/ /phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste/ /sku las sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin/ /

thor tshugs gsal ba rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkha' las ni babs pa yi/ /thog ni rang rig sngags kyis bzlog /\u0f00 ma hA su ka badzra che ge mo badzra/ /\u0f00 su ra ta ban+d+ha hU~M phaT ces gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni gzhan gyi lce gnon pa'i

thabs so/ /mar gyi tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/ /dur khrod sol ba blangs nas su/ /sngags kyi bdag por bsgoms nas su/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /mi snyan smra pa 'am shags rgol ba'i/ /lce yi gzugs su bris pa yi/ /steng

du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje rgya gram bsgoms pa yi/ /dbus su ri rab bskyed par bya/ /de steng bdag gis mnan bsams na/ /tshig dbang lha yang dbang 'gyur na/ /shags la sogs pa smos ci dgos/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di

ni pra dbab pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi/ /khye'u bu mo gang yang rung / /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /dbab pa'i snod du rab tu brtag /ting 'dzin rtsal dang ldan pas bya/ /gzhan gyis byas na dbyangs

par 'gyur/ /dang por phyi nang khrus byas te/ /sdig pa sbyang phyir 'dul khrims dpog /'od kyi 'phro 'dus byin gyis brlab/ /rgyan gyi khyad par rnams kyis brgyan/ /snying kar hU~M ni bsgom par bya/ /spyi bo tsug tu ha bsgom mo/ /a ni kha ru de bzhin

te/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/ /'phags pa kun mkhyen spyan drangs te/ /de las 'od zer bskul zhing dbab/ /dz+hau ni bskul ba'i sngags tshig ste/ /gang dbab dz+hau yis bskul bar bya/ /byis pa'i lus la thim par bsam/ /byis pa'i

tsid ta gzhal med khang / /dbab pa'i lha nyid bzhugs bsams te/ /lag rgya rdo rje thal mo las/ /sor mo phyir bsnol kha sbub la/ /mtheb gnyis so so'i mthil bkug pa'o/ /rdo rje tshig tu bzlas pa'i sngags/ /che ge mo zhig a a

zhes/ /brjod cing rab tu bskul byas na/ /'gul ba dang ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /khru gang tsam nas lnga yi bar/ /'jigs skrag nas ni 'phar bar 'gyur/ /snying la gnas pa'i lha des ni/ /smra gsung kun dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig

rten pa'i/ /ci 'dod gtam ni smra bar 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad bral ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yang / /cho ga 'di yis 'bab 'gyur na/ /'jig rten pa lta smos ci dgos zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dug gtang

ba'i thabs so/ /sbrul ni mi sdug gdug cing khro/ /'jigs byed nag po rab tu 'bar/ /dug gi lce gnyis mche ba can/ /sol ba rdo rgyus dag gis bri/ /bskul ba'i yi ge snying po 'di/ /sbrul gyi khong par rab tu bsam/ /kha~M

kha de nang mi zad dug /'jigs par byed pa rab bsgoms na/ /sbrul de rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/ /de nas zos shig ces bskul te/ /mtshan ma nas ni zhugs nas ni/ /khong du song ste zos bsams na/ /dug gis gzung bar

gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dug dbyung ba'i thabs so/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /spyan ras gzigs ni bsgom par bya/ /kha dog dkar po hri spros

te/ /dug can khong du zhugs pa yis/ /dug rnams hri la 'dus nas ni/ /hU~M gis khong nas phyir phyung dang / /phaT kyis bar snang khams su gtor/ /yang na gzhan gyi khong du spo/ /des ni de ma thag tu yang / /dug rnams dbyung

bar gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dug spo ba'i thabs so/ /dug can snying kar \u0f00 dkar las/ /'od zer dkar pos dug bsdus pas/ /\u0f00 nyid nag por snar byung nas/ /gzhan gyi lce 'am mtshan ma 'am/ /khong

du zhugs par rab bsgoms na/ /'pho ba rtag tu gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug gso ba'i thabs so/ /mdze 'bras shu ba phol mig dang / /'brum bu la sogs nad rnams kun/ /a dkar dag gi

'phro 'du yis/ /gong ma bzhin du dbyung bar bya/ /spo ba yang ni de bzhin no/ /de ni khams las gyur pa yis/ /nad rnams thams cad nges par sel/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni bkres skom zhi ba sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /bkres skom can gyi nyon

mongs pa 'am/ /yang na bsgrub pa 'am gang yang rung / /sbyor ba 'dir ni brtsam par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po/ /nam mkha'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /ba ni kha yi nang du bsgom/ /\u0f00 ni lce la rnam bsams te/ /yid bzhin bdud

rtsi lta bu yi/ /bza' ba'i gnas su de nyid bsam/ /des ni bkres skom sdug bsngal sel/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rnam par dag pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /\u0f00 ni mig la rab bsams te/ /yul kun rnam snang mdzad du bsgom/ /de ltar

rtag tu goms pa dang / /chos kun sku gsung rdo rje mthong / /de nyid rnam dag spyan du grags/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i lha mthu bo che rnams zil gyis gnon cing tshig nyan pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i

dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba bsam/ /b+hi zhes bya ba'i snying bo yis/ /mthu chen rnams ni drangs nas su/ /bsdigs pa dag kyang byas nas ni/ /zil gyis gnon cing nyan par

'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni lha mo tsun d+ha bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /sngags kyi bdag por bdag gnas pa'i/ /snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /tsu~M zhes bya ba'i 'phro 'du las/ /bdag nyid tsun d+ha'i gzugs su

bsgyur/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom/ /'di ni chos dbyings bsgrub pa ste/ /bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bshad do/ /de la 'di ni dza~M b+ha la nor bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /

nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /snying gar dza~M gyi 'phro 'du las/ /dza~M b+ha la yi gzugs dag gis/ /bar snang khams kun gang ba ni/ /mdog sngon thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ /gsus

po che la mi thung gzugs/ /yid bzhin nor bu thogs pa yis/ /dbul ba thams cad sel bar bsam/ /'dod pa la ni de dag dbab/ /des ni dbul ba sel bar byed/ /nor dang gter gyi bdag por 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni

rdo rje a dzan bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /shing gcig drung ngam bzhi mdo 'am/ /ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su/ /rdo rje a dza bsgrub par bya/ /pad ma ban d+ha kha sbyar du tshil chen bshang gci khu ba dang / /ma hA rag ta las byung ba'i/ /du ba ban d+har

chags pa dang / /bshang gci rag tas sbrus nas ni/ /ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /gsum du byas na de nyid la/ /rang gi gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad/ /nyi shu dgu yi nam phyed na/ /btab na dngos grub grub 'gyur te/ /mig la

bskus na ci yang mthong / /mi snang ba dang rkang 'gyogs dang / /de la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams/ /thob par 'gyur te gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje ro langs bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus

su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rnam par bsgom/ /dur khrod ri brag gnyan pa'i sar/ /ro yi rdzas btsal de nas kyang / /ro yi gnyen por bdag bsams te/ /de yi steng du bdag gnas la/

de la dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom/ /de sngags rgyun du bzlas bya zhing / /dgug pa'i pho nya drag tu bskul/ /mdog mdangs bkrag snum byung ba dang / /bdud rtsi yis ni bskur bar bya/ /de nas 'gul bar gyur pa dang / /phyag rgya

bzhi yis gzhum par bya/ /sngags kyi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad/ /de nas rab tu 'phar ba dang / /'gro ba ris drug gang yin pa/ /rdo rje drag tu gdab par bya/ /rdo rje so yis gcad bya zhing / /sngags zlos khong du bstim par bya/ /de nas

langs par gyur pa dang / /rdo rje byin nas dbang yang bskur/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yang blud par bya/ /las rnams gang 'dod byed du bzhug /yang na gser ram gos mtshon nam/ /rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub rnams/ /ji ltar

'dod pa rkyen gyis bsgyur/ /gang 'dod pa de gdon mi za/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje sgyu ma sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rde'u shing bu yi rgyu dag las/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs

byas te/ /she'u re sman gyis byugs nas ni/ /rdo rje sngags kyis tshig 'di bzlas/ /she'u re'u i na ya/ /a mo ka a g+hus sa g+hus/ /shing bu dag gis gdab bya zhing / /ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /des ni sna tshogs gzugs

su 'gyur/ /bsdu bar 'dod na slar la bzlog /de yang bkri drang thabs su 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni ro bsreg pa'i bsgrub thabs so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ /bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur

bsgoms te/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /dri zhim chu yis byug par bya/ /zhun chen khu bar btsos pa yi/ /ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya/ /dbang po rnams kyi gnas dag tu/ /lha yi phyag rgya dgod par bya/ /gnas der sdong

bu re re la/ /lha rnams snying po bris par gdags/ /ro yi phyi rol shun pa la/ /'gro drug sa bon bkod nas ni/ /rims gyis sbyang ba'i las su bya/ /thab khung dkyil gang yin pa yi/ /phyag rgya gzhung dang 'thun par dgod/ /de

steng shing brtsigs gru bzhi la/ /ka ba zur bzhi suM brtsegs kyi/ /bar khang yang thog bcas phar bya/ /bar khang ro gzhag shar du bstan/ /yang stengs ras saM shog shog la/ /bris pa'i phyag rgya tshang bar bgod/ /bar

khang glo dkar phyogs bzhi nas/ /gzungs thag phyogs bzhir bla mar dbul/ /de mthar 'khor gyi lha rnams dgod/ /de nas rdo rje rgyal po yis/ /me yi 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad/ /rdo rje las kyi kar ma yis/ /las kyi phreng ba rdzogs

par rol/ /rdo rje bla ma gcig gis ni/ /ro yi nyes pa bgrang zhing bshags/ /rdo rje skabs sbyor chen po yis/ /rdo rje mchod pa skabs su dbul/ /bkra shis gnas kyi smon lam ni/ /skabs sam mjug tu gdab par bya/ /

rdo rje grangs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /grangs gzung dkar byang bla ma dbul/ /sdig pa'i gnag byang gshegs shing bsreg /me lha spyan drang mchod pa bya/ /bstod pa dag kyang legs par bya/ /ro yi sgrib pa 'byongs ma 'byongs/ /me

la ltas su blta bar bya/ /mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na/ /bsreg sbyang cho ga rgya cher bya/ /de ni tshogs rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje thal chen sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de la thal ba thams cad kun/ /

gu gul nag po dang sbyar ba/ /ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa/ /rdo rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab na/ /bar du gcod pa'i gnyen por 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni phrin las bzhi'i

bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis/ /rdzas dang kha dog phyogs dang dbyibs/ /yam shing bsreg rdzas khyad par las/ /dkar dang dmar ser mthing gnag las/ /shar lho nub byang phyogs dag tu/ /zlum po

le'u tshe pad ma zhi/ /gru bzhi zur brgyad 'khor lo rgyas/ /gru chad gzhu dbyibs zla gam dbang / /gru gsum b+ha ga mngon spyod pa'o/ /ting 'dzin byams dang dang bas zhi/ /snying rje dga' bas rgyas pa ste/ /dga' dang chags

pas dbang du 'gyur/ /btang snyoms khros pas drag por 'gyur/ /so so'i las kyi lha rgyud la/ /sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs dang / /glu rgyud 'byor pas mchod par bya/ /zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la/ /khro bos ye shes me

ru sbyang / /so so'i rgyud du bshad bstabs te/ /klong yangs 'khyil pa'i hong khung du/ /dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/ /sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg par bya/ /nyon mongs lnga yi dam rdzas ni/ /ye shes lnga yi klong du dbul/ /phung po lnga

ni yab lnga la/ /'byung ba yum lnga'i dbyibs su bstims/ /shes pa brgyad ni ma brgyad la'o/ /yul brgyad phra men brgyad la bstim/ /skye bzhis bsdus pa'i sreg rdzas rnams/ /rnam thar sgo bzhi'i klong du bstim/ /sgrib dang dngos

grub don rnams ni/ /me la mkhas pas brtag par bya/ /so so'i dbyibs dang kha dog la/ /dbyibs dang kha dog shes par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdzas sgrub pa'i thabs gsang ba'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa

bzhi ldan nas/ /gnas dang sa gzhi brtags par ni/ /sa stegs tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /dbus su thig bzhi le'u tshe dgu/ /de'i mtha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bya/ /sgo bzhi sgo khyud bcas par bri/ /mtha' zad bskal pa'i me ri 'bar/ /

dbus su zla gam kha sprod bri/ /phyogs mtshams brgyad du kha~M brgyad bri/ /'khor lo'i bar khyams mu khyud la/ /nang du bltas pa'i kha~M brgyad gsal/ /rtsibs la nang du lta ba brgyad/ /mu khyud brgyad la phyir bltas brgyad/ /gru chad bzhi la

nang bltas bzhi/ /sgo bzhir phyir blta bri bar bya/ /phyi rol bar khyams de dag la/ /phyi lta nyi shu rtsa brgyad bri/ /bskal pa'i me ri phyi khyams la/ /phyir blta bcu ni bri bar bya/ /de la phyag rgya rim par dgod/ /ro yi tshol stangs rnam bzhi

yis/ /dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams btsal/ /ye shes spyan gyis lta ba dang / /rdo rje 'gros kyis btsal ba dang / /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rol pa dang / /ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'jol tshul dang / /btsal nas maN Dal sgo bzhi nas/ /

bro chen bzhi yis sbyang bar bya/ /shar du dug gsum 'joms pa'i bro/ /lho ru khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro/ /nub tu rta mchog zhal gyi bro/ /byang du gdul sbyong drag po'i bros/ /sbyang bar bya ba rab tu gces/ /de nas dbus su gzhag bya ste/ /

mgo bo shar du bstan pa de'i/ /phung po bru~M las gzhal med khang / /de ru phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog bsgom/ /so so'i rdzas kyi gnas rnams la/ /rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod/ /bsnyen pas byin phebs rtags byung nas/ /bam de

byang shar mtshams su bsgral/ /rdo rje thig gis btab nas kyang / /rdzas rnams so so'i sgos su gdab/ /de mtshon rnam lngas bkro bar bya/ /'khor lo'i spyi bo nyid nas bkro/ /rdo rjes snying ga'i phyogs nas bkro/ /rin chen zur brgyad
lte ba nas/ /pad mas kha yi phyogs nas so/ /ral gris yan lag rnams nas bkro/ /de nas phyag rgya'i gnas rnams su/ /rdzas rnams go rim bzhin du dgod/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i snod dgu la/ /sku gsung thugs

dang ldan par ni/ /gsol ba'i 'od dang bcas par dgram/ /rdzas kyis mdzes par brgyan par bya/ /rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dgram/ /mchod pa'i dam rdzas tshang bar bsham/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen po kun/ /bdag nyid

phyag rgyar gnas pa de/ /bskyed pa'i ting 'dzin tshul bzhin bskyed/ /rang bzhin rdzogs chen spyan drangs mchod/ /bsgrub pa nyams len bzlog par bya/ /dngos grub gsol dang dbang bskur bya/ /de nas gtor ma tsho gsum

du/ /dang por bcad de sbyin sreg bya/ /bar mas mkha' 'gro tshim par bya/ /tha ma mi zad gter du sba/ /las rnams rdzogs par byas na ni/ /dpal chen nyid kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos zhes

gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog chen po bsgrub pa'i thabs so/ /don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sa stengs chag phyed tshad du bya/ /sum brtseg byas dbus zla gam brgyad/ /phyi mtha' thod pas bskor ba la/ /

me dpung 'bar bas bskor ba'o/ /de yi phyi rim dmar chen rgyas/ /dbus su ban d+ha mtshan ldan la/ /yab yum snying po bris la bzhag /zla gam brgyad la ma brgyad gzhag /mthing gnag ma tha me ri 'bar/ /de 'og thod
